Summary: Britney at the front desk was great! She was very helpful and accommodating. Our room was very spacious and clean. It was as if we were the very first people to stay in that room. And to top it off, it’s just a 5 minute walk to the shuttle to Disney!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Any hotel with free parking and is within walking distance of Disneyland is probably saving you in the neighborhood of $60 a day in parking fees, so I have to compliment them for that.  With that said, they also have a kitchen that would be expected for an extended stay place, without much of the seedier parts of some (the stairwell could use an occasional sweeping, though).  I don't expect much from where I stay when I go to Disneyland, because mostly I'm using it for purely sleeping and they fulfilled all my needs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was the most unkept place to stay I have EVER seen. Stains all over bed linens and carpet, smelled like urine, AC didn’t work. No amenities.  Very ran down throughout!  Highly recommend staying somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear KateH3860, We apologize for the issues you encountered during your recent stay. We know a fresh, clean hotel sets the tone for a wonderful stay; therefore, we sincerely regret this was not your experience. Our hotel is committed to ensuring cleanliness to all guests, and we will ensure this is addressed appropriately. We hope you will return on your next visit to the area so we can show you our commitment to outstanding experiences. Thank you again for your feedback.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Blood and pee stains on 2 rooms we were assigned. There was another lady in the lobby getting a refund for her room that had blood stains and pubic hair on the sheets. We decided to ask for our money back too and stay somewhere else and the guy at front desk told me to check my attitude then yelled at me that he didn't need to help me and to get out. Like it was my problem the hotel was nasty!!! Worst customer service and most disgusting hotel I have ever stayed at. Zero stars if I could!!!
Manager Response: Dear K4528YLkristend, It was disappointing to read your comments concerning your stay at our hotel. We do not take these concerns lightly, especially with the cleanliness of our hotel. We will address this matter with our housekeeping associates to ensure all rooms are thoroughly cleaned and inspected before allocating them to future guests. We also apologize for the behavior of our associate and thank you for informing us of this incident. We understand your disappointment, and your feedback is being reviewed with the team member to see what went wrong. We hope you will give us another opportunity to accommodate you. We are confident we can replace this experience with a more positive memory!  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: One my first day at the hotel I came in contact with 2 people on two different occasions who appeared to be on drugs. Including one woman in the elevator who was talking to herself. There were other random sketchy people walking around the hotel. I am unaware of they were guests.   When my party and I returned to the hotel our first night after dinner there was a group of 5 or 6 men drinking in the hotel parking lot in the dark. I reported it to the front desk and they appeared disinterested. The entire third floor smelled like marijuana on Saturday evening.  I did not see any security at the hotel, which would make such a difference.   I had to sleep in one horrible pillow . When I called to ask for an additional pillow a man at the front desk said they were out. My neck will
Manager Response: Dear Br33M, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We take guest feedback seriously, as it allows us to continue to improve our guest experience. We appreciate your review and will take the necessary steps to ensure the issues you described do not occur.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Front guest is excellent helped me with directions and location hidden gems definitely will be returning front desk even called me after checking in to make sure I was satisfied with my room and that I consider 5 star customer service
Manager Response: Dear jessicamZ1952OD, Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America for your recent accommodations. We take pride in guests' satisfaction, so we are thrilled this was your experience. We will share your compliments with our team to let them know their efforts are appreciated. We hope to be your hotel of choice if another visit to our area is in your plans.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Pros: the proximity to Disneyland  Cons: everything else. The breakfast consisted of packaged muffins and granola bars - nothing else. There were no blow dryers available, no shampoos included in the room, no plugs by the nightstands, only one bath towel, a sink that did not drain properly, and a bathtub that was peeling.

We are taking appropriate steps to ensure future guests do not encounter the same issues. We hope you will accept our apologies and consider giving us another chance to show you the outstanding service we typically provide.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: My husband and I are Visiting from a neighboring city checking in for NYE Michael was who assisted me he was super helpful, quick and professional. We are Looking forward to many stays in the future. Thank you 😊
Manager Response: Dear ashleygI8236GY, Thank you for staying at Extended Stay America. Summary: Michael’s the best! He’s a cool, funny, and kind person. Extended stay America would not be the same without him. He provides great customer service and let us check in early. If you plan on staying here he’s the guy to see.

Summary: Hotel is great! Especially Michael he is amazing, if he isn’t attending us I will not come again. He gave great customer service and made our stay feel very comfortable!! He is super funny and was really accommodating to our needs!

Summary Heading: Amazing time here and thank you Michael!

Thank you so much for making my stay extra magical! I’m planning to come back again soon and will definitely stay here for my future visits!!!

Summary: Michael & Brian were very accommodating for our early check-in. Location is great for Disneyland  and its great the room has a mini-kitchen. Really amazing service and would certainly recommend this hotel.

Summary: The hotel is in an ideal location. Close to a variety of places to eat. The check in process was quick and easy. Staff was extremely friendly and accommodating. Would definitely book at this location again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: 10/10 experience! Micheal is the best! He helped me out with everything. Easy check in! Would definitely recommend him! If anyone will need assistance or help, I’d suggest him all the way! Satisfaction guaranteed!
Manager Response: Dear milad854,   Thank you for staying at Extended Stay America. We were thrilled to read your comments about the great service you received from our staff and how they exceeded your expectations. Thank you for your kind compliments about Micheal; we will enjoy sharing your remarks with him. It was our pleasure to host your visit, and we hope you will revisit soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Michael at the front desk went above and beyond helping us check in. We arrived earlier than check in at 7 am and he allowed us to use the facilities to get freshened up and he stored our luggage. Then when we returned around 12:30 pm he checked us right in even though check in didn’t officially start till 3:00 pm. The manager kind of blew us off when we first came back and told us it wasn’t cleaned and that we had to wait and sit in the lobby, then he proceeded to sit down and go back to watch a video in his phone. Michael promptly returned from his lunch a few minutes later and said he would help us and got us in our room right away that he had assigned that morning and was cleaned previously. Michael is very kind, polite, and very customer-first oriented.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The free parking at this hotel is not worth it.  The hotel gives a vibe of catering to the homeless.  It appears the hotel may be contracted to provide housing for those in need.  The rooms are dirty and smell horrid.  The shower was not cleaned as I found a used soap bar in the shower.  The curtains are so worn they have holes in them.  The grab and go breakfast is a tasteless, dry pre package muffin or a granola bar.  There was no drinkable water anywhere in the hotel.  No filtered fountain.  The hotel was quiet.  The beds very firm.  The water pressure in the shower useless if you have long hair.  Pick another hotel and save yourself some grief.
Manager Response: Dear kimcJ2525RH, thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you faced during your stay. We appreciate our guest's valuable feedback as we continually strive to grow and improve our guest services. Everything we do aims to provide you with an excellent hotel experience, and we would like to regain your trust, and we hope you will give us that chance in the future.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: It is nice to have a fully equipped kitchen. The rooms are comfortable. Britney and Micheal were both very accommodating and helpful during my stay. The location is great, walking distance to Honda center and angel stadium. Highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear 314travisq, thank you for your kind words and recommendation! Britney and Micheal are an asset to us, and we are happy to learn that they made a memorable stay for you with us here at Extended Stay America. We are glad that after an exciting day of exploring the city, you could retire to your suite and take advantage of our fully equipped kitchens, It was a pleasure hosting your visit, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Michael at the front desk was extremely kind and helpful. He fixed our issue with the water heating issue in a timely manner. He had very great customer service. Thank you Michael for an awesome experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Michael is the best front desk clerk and was super helpful from the moment we walked in and even got us our room asap after such a long tiring drive to be welcomed by such a pleasant and friendly person was so relieving and really put our minds at ease that we chose the right place. Summary Heading: Micheal at the front desk was great

Second time we stay at this location and it won’t be the last..you guys have got yourselves some regular guest from here in out!

Summary: Michael was wonderful and so helpful! He made the trip up here easy and stress-free. We went straight to the hotel and were able to relax after our trip. Summary: The staff at this location is amazing! Michael was a pleasure to work with! It is a short walk to the park and has a great little to-go breakfast bar. The kitchen is a great thing to have when food at the park is so much! I would stay again!

Summary: I just wanted to leave a quick note about Michael. He was extremely kind and accommodating for our needs. We were headed to Disney the last day of our stay and he saw us struggling with our bags as we did not know what to do with them. He immediately offered help and offered to store our luggage all day, 10/10 guy! Really appreciate the efforts to go the extra mile!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We came to this hotel from one that had cancelled our reservation, so we had to check into a different one (with no hot water). We ended up coming to the extended stay, explained our situation, and the manager, mo let us checkin early for a shower. Michael & B were incredibly helpful and kind as well, they accommodated all of our needs while we were there and made things so easy & stress free for us! We will be staying here in the future!
Manager Response: Dear emilydM3157MW, it was a pleasure to read your fantastic review about Extended Stay America. Summary: He’s a great host I like him. This hotel wouldn’t be the same without him… i also like he’s personality he’s very funny. I love the hotel personal…The most beautiful part is we get to see the fireworks right by Disneyland.

Summary: One of my favorites spots to stay, I really  never have any issues when I stay here! The front desk staff are polite and friendly. Overall great place, would 10/10 recommend to friends and family.

Summary: The new assistant manager Micheal has made this place a nicer place to stay at. I see changes for the better since he started working here. Very close to the happiest place in the world. Get to see the beautiful disney fireworks from my room.

Summary Heading: Flashy website, property exterior and lobby but rooms trash

Manager Response: Dear Steven, it was disappointing to read your comments concerning your stay at our hotel. Please accept our apologies, as we never mean to disappoint our guests. Summary: I've stayed here several times in the past due to its close location to Disneyland. But this recent stay was my last one. In the past, I've only stayed 1-2 days but this last time I stayed 5 nights. First, we check in and they gave us a room that someone was already staying in so they had to give us a new one.   Second, our fridge was leaking and while the staff was friendly, they didn't seem too concerned about our issue when we reported it. They said someone would be there to check and no one came for hours. So we went back to the front desk and turns out they forgot about it. The woman we spoke to asked someone on her team if we could be moved yet to another room and she was told no. So we were given old towels to put on the floor while we wait for maintenance to come. It
Manager Response: Dear Rmorris619, first, we want to apologize for the issues you experienced during your recent stay with us. Summary: Been here for a while now  Everyone has been very helpful  Ali in the front desk has been very nice and helpful  All clean rooms Manger has been working with us so very blessed  They are fast on request on somethings we need

Summary Heading: No! Do NOT Stay Here! Worst hotel I've stayed in. EVER.
Summary: I am not super fussy. And I'll start by saying that all but one of the desk clerks we dealt with was super nice and friendly. That's the only good thing about this place. Our room smelled so foul. I can only describe it as cat urine that was soaked into the faux wood floor. I got physically ill walking in. We expected a room stocked with the amenities promised: coffee maker, hair dryer, plates, cups, silverware, dish soap, etc. Yet, we had to request all of those. I actually went out and bought air freshener (which only masked the putrid smell) and paper towels. There is NO maid service unless you stay longer than two weeks!  You have to carry your used towels to the front desk to get replacements (if they have them clean.) They advertise free breakfast, but didn't have any food
Manager Response: Dear floridavacationer_11,  Thank you for being our valued guest and for posting your remarks online. We are sorry your room did not have the amenities you desired or needed. Being an extended stay property focused on guests staying seven or more nights, we have complimentary items at the front desk, such as a fully equipped kitchen, grab-and-go breakfast, linen exchange, and a comfortable in-suite environment to make you feel at home while away from home. Your comments will be noted and shared with our Brand Leaders to assist them in determining new breakfast offerings for future implementation. We also provide housekeeping services to guests who stay eight or more nights; however, these services are always available upon request for an additional fee. In response to your feedback, we will be coaching our front desk to ensure we are communicating our services and amenities during guest arrivals and providing each guest with professional customer service. However, we apologize for the housekeeping issues you encountered. We have checklists in place to inspect every suite after service. Unfortunately, we missed something during this process. We are working with our Housekeeping team to reiterate the importance of our daily checklists to make sure this isn't repeated. We hope you will give us another opportunity to provide a better experience on your next stay. Thank you.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel is nice, the staff are courteous, and they make a hoot attempt to keep it clean. The rooms are exactly as described on their website. This is a 2 star hotel. I would say a little better than a motel 6 with a refrigerator and mini kitchen. The plus side, very close to Disney, very close to target, very close to restaurants. For couples wanting to save money this is a great options, just remember that the bed is a little hard and not as romantic as a Hilton. What you do save you can spend in the park. That’s a bonus!!! Free parking is a bonus!!! 20 min walk to the park is a bonus!!! Overall, a good hotel for what I needed.
Manager Response: Dear E5756SZjennifere,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your visit to Anaheim Hills. While we are glad you were satisfied with many aspects of your stay, we are disappointed that we did not meet all of your expectations. Nevertheless, we take your concerns seriously and appreciate the feedback. Our goal is to deliver outstanding service to every guest at every opportunity. Therefore, we hope that you will come back soon and let us show you the hospitality we are known for providing.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Let’s start with the most obvious. This hotel is super close to Disney, 20 min walk & 10 min Uber ride. The hotel is family oriented. The online photos are accurate, it is definitely a 2 star hotel with kitchenette and fridge. I found the hotel clean and as expected. No need to buy a cooler, You are super close to a Target where you can buy all your grocery needs. Finally, parking is free. All these advantages make the hotel worth it. Things to consider, beds are okay but if you are sensitive bring your own pillow. I had a small issue with a room but staff was super attentive and were able to accommodate a new room. The customer service was excellent. The breakfast is less than impressive and recommend, aside from coffee, you bring your own. Traveler tip, I believe you can see
Manager Response: none

Summary: The service was okay. Initially they had stated there was no room for me despite prepayment. But after seeing I booked directly through hotel. They gave me a room. Down side they don’t offer housekeeping regularly when staying more than a week. One staff said twice a week another every 2 weeks. So that was a bit bothersome.
Manager Response: Dear mayramA19HU,   Thank you for your recent review of your stay. We apologize for your disappointment with your recent stay at our hotel. We are thrilled to read that you loved our courteous associates and your clean and comfortable room, along with a fully equipped kitchen. Summary: This is a great location.  It is so much to see and great places to eat.  Disneyland is very close and waliking distance to the park and downtown Disney.  The staff are friendly very helpful I finding where the places to go and the places to eat.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They are very helpful and the rooms are very clean! Great stay right here at extended stay in Anaheim.  Will come again some day 10 ought of ten I would recommend to all my friends and family ti stay here
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nowadays I’m just looking for a decent customer service option  I tried calling front desk ahead of time for most of the day. Phone was infinite ringing. Not sure if there’s a different number now despite reservation and webpage showing same number  At least front desk staff was more than helpful when we did check in, but phone experience from 12 - 5 pm was nonexistent
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved this hotel! All the people were very kind and so accommodating to our Disney trip. Such a great deal compared to the hotels surrounding the same spot but this is just as easy to walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review. It's so nice to know you enjoyed your stay at Extended Stay America and loved the courteous service provided by our associates. Our guests often comment about our convenient location near Disneyland, so we are also happy it worked out well for you too. We look forward to having you as our guest again whenever your travels bring you back to the area. Travel Safe!   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Good location and convenient the area is close to areas and great place for resteaurants going to Disney it is close to walk to the park and downtown area and the places to eat and also going here and
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was very clean and spacious. Has a simple little kitchen to use that has a stove, fridge and microwave. Staff is very friendly and helpful. The room did have a lingering smoke smell from previous guest but was easy to air out.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting Extended Stay America for your recent visit and for sharing your comments. Our team was so pleased to learn you enjoyed your stay, especially our comfortable accommodations, kitchen, and friendly hospitality. Thank you once more for being our guest, and we look forward to seeing you in the future!   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Just checked in at front desk  Received all the information I needed. No hassle, just relevant information with a smile  There was also a crying baby in one of the corridors so we asked to have a new room and we’re accommodated. Thanks for the ease !
Manager Response: none

Summary: Finding parking was a hassle for nearby hotels. Reliability didn’t seem high and there were additional concerns about nefarious advertising of free parking when it was not actually offered or was reservations only   Extended stay helped solve this problem
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is one of the worse hotels that I have stayed at in the Anaheim area. It offers a 10 point system cleaning service. ABSOLUTELY UNTRUE! I found hair on my sheets and near the matress pad. I had to strip the bed completely and put on clean sheets.  On the last day, I found trash under the bed. The tub paint was peeling. As I realize that there is a staff shortage, this property was disgusting. The breakfast offered was oatmeal only. The hotel has an old musty smell. Our room, even after buying deodorizer, still smelled bad. Definietly an unclean and unsanitary property. I would give this property a -3. The only positive was the staff as they were nice.
Manager Response: OnAir748377, thank you for taking the time to evaluate your stay. We regret not meeting your expectations and apologize for the concerns you had with the guest room. We do not take these concerns lightly, especially with the cleanliness of our hotel, as this is an essential priority. We will address this matter with our housekeeping associates to ensure that it does not happen again. On a positive note, we are happy you were pleased with the service our associates delivered. We hope to have the opportunity to make your next stay with us outstanding in every respect.  Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Terrible service. They canceled my reservation due to overbooking
Summary: I wish I could give this place a negative star and actually base my review on my stay. I did not stay at this hotel. In fact, my reservation was canceled right when I arrived at LAX. My reservation was booked and paid for on January 24th. On April 8th, my plane landed in LAX and at 10PM and I see that I have a voicemail on my phone. The front desk left a voicemail telling me there were no rooms available. I quickly call them and they tell me to call the booking agency I went through since they are obligated to provide me with a replacement room. I go through my emails and see that I actually booked my room through extended stay's main website. I call back and they tell me there is nothing they can do and they thought I had booked with someone else. This is after a long flight
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us. We are sorry for the reservation issues you encountered at the time of check-in and that our hotel was overbooked and unable to accommodate you. We offer no excuses for this mix-up, and we apologize for the inconvenience. We understand the frustration and truly hope you will offer us another opportunity to serve you.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Just have to say that my girls at the p.m. shift today are on point. Great customer service. Makes me feel at home.  Hear to have some family fun. Thanks girls, keep up the great work😉.   The Esparza Fam😁
Manager Response: It's so nice to read your positive review of your recent stay at Extended Stay America. Our goal is to provide our guests with exceptional service, so we are thrilled we were successful in doing so during your stay. Your comments have been shared with the team, and they were very appreciative of your recognition. Thank you for being our guest, and we look forward to your next stay!    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Very helpful reservation had no problems communication was well room was clean very close to Disneyland not as far as I thought it's actually close to a lot of good food places like Bubba Gump and the Cheesecake Factory
Manager Response: none

Summary: Booked this hotel through Agoda. Went to check in at 8 pm with two kids. The front desk informed me that Agoda website overbooked and we don’t have a room. I have to book Hilton for $200 extra. Nobody from the hotel or Agoda informed me until we were ready to check in .  Worst experience ever.
Manager Response: Pramod, thank you for sharing your review. We are terribly sorry about the issues you experienced with your reservation, and even more, so that we did not appropriately correct the situation. We certainly apologize for the problems you encountered with your reservation which led to your disappointing stay. Our hotel has a standard cancellation policy that applies in most situations such as yours. If you made a reservation through a third-party, prepaid booking site, you must make financial inquiries through them. We recommend that you contact them directly for the resolution regarding your billing concerns. Your comments have been discussed with the team, and we are reviewing our procedures, so this does not happen again. Thank you for your feedback, and we hope you will give us another chance to make this up to you and demonstrate excellent hospitality from our team. Thanks again for being our guest and sharing your feedback.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The place was close to the park and it was clean. I we had an amazing time and we are very likely to use this establishment again in the future. The front desk was helpful and quick to address our concerns. Thank you so much,  you made our trip fantastic.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such wonderful feedback for Extended Stay America! We are delighted to hear that you had such a great experience, from our excellent location to your interactions with our cordial team, who work around the clock to ensure a memorable stay for every guest! It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to welcoming you again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great for extended family that wants to make meals in the room
Summary: We had a great time as a family. We have stayed many places and these guys were great! We got as many towels as we needed and the kitchen was an awesome benefit! And roll away beds were available and pretty comfortable! The scooters we got were delivered and picked up from here and that was good!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was helpful and friendly.  It is very close to Disneyland and a great place to stay close for a good price.   In the morning there was great grab and go breakfast for the kids to easily take on the walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us a part of your trip. Our location close to Disneyland is one of our best features; thank you for pointing this out for future travelers. We also appreciate your gracious comment about our breakfast service. It was a pleasure serving you at Extended Stay America, and we look forward to welcoming you back whenever you are in this area again.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Staff was great & super helpful, rooms were clean and they accommodated us so well when we had issues booking through a 3rd party! Highly recommend. Food within walking distance & the walk to the parks was really nice! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff is very nice and friendly. My family enjoyed their stay. It’s close to Disneyland which made it easy for our family vacation. You get a nice deal if you come during the week. The hotel is pet friendly too!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America for your stay and for sharing your experience with fellow travelers. We are pleased that you loved our fantastic location and that our devoted associates took excellent care of you and your family. We hope to have the pleasure of accommodating you again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: A small basic hotel that's perfect for a night's rest after Disneyland. The park is walking distance too! But there's also the option of riding the bus if walking is a little too tiring. Everything was super convenient and quick. Staff was very nice too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My first time visiting here and I am impressed! checkin process was easy, location is perfect distance from toy story parking! peaceful and definitely family friendly! They also made sure to call me before my check in time for when some of my accommodations were unavailable which I definitely appreciated! Would visit again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the perfect rating. We are glad you had a wonderful time at Extended Stay America. We appreciate you for highlighting our ideal location,  parking convenience as well as smooth check-in experience. We are grateful to you for mentioning we will be an excellent choice for family stays. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to your return.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The staff handled our room issues with the refrigerator very well. Hotel is dog-friendly and the location is 15 minute walk to Disneyland and less than 5 minute drive. Thank you to the staff and the lead for their customer service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The customer service was excellent at this location. And the location is very good. Its so close to everything we were doing on our trip. Brittany at the front desk was exceptionally nice. Room and lobby were clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us!  We are so pleased you had a great stay at Extended Stay America. We truly appreciate your kind comments regarding our convenient location, friendly staff and comfortable suites. We will share your compliments with the team, especially Brittany. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!     Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: It was a nice place very reasonably priced for the location. Clean rooms and lobby. Very helpful staff. My one negative would be bring your pillow from home. Other than that great stay.  Super close to many things.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Extended Stay America Suited in Anaheim is our new go to place to stay when we are taking our Disneyland trips.  Cesar at the front desk was very friendly and knowledgeable about the area, made us feel really welcomed once we were checking in.  Close walking distance to Disney and free parking.  We will definitely be booking here again :)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Extended Stay America.  We are delighted to hear you liked the service provided by our staff and  our location close to Disneyland was perfect for your needs. We will share your compliments with the team especially Cesar. We appreciate you being our guest and look forward to welcoming you back!    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Great customer service at the front desk from Cesar!!! Took his time explaining everything and making sure all our questions were answered. Cozy rooms and very clean. Great place to stay for your Disney trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We are happy with our stay and our company has extended 3 times and may extend again. Management and staff are hard working and friendly. We come here often and currently working ar the port in Jacksonville.
Manager Response: Thank you for making Extended Stay America your home away from home. We accommodate many business travelers and enjoy providing exceptional hospitality. We know that small things can make a big difference, especially for our business guests, so we do our best to offer everything you might need while away from home. Thank you also for recognizing the efforts of our associates. They will appreciate your kind words. It was a pleasure to host you, and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I came here almost a year ago felt kind of no one was every there to help but this time they were always helping someone or running around helping other coworkers or customers the 3 people at the front desk were all amazing and if anything all three of them should get a little kick back when they have a fully booked hotel cause they are all hard works will be coming back for the Disney level customers service and this will be our spot to come to with anyone and will recommend it to everyone
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a wonderful experience! The staff is attentive and friendly! Especially Lexi at the front desk! Such a fabulous personality! The coffee is fresh and hot every morning. The laundry room is clean and easy to use! I suggest getting the app as I was informed by Lexi it’s much more efficient and you don’t have to bother with quarters! The room is clean and comfy and has a kitchen area minus a dishwasher and oven. Although it’s not needed with all the restaurant options at a waking distance. The Cheesecake Factory an eye shot away, & delicious! I would recommend staying here to anyone I know or meet. Will definitely be back in the future! Thank you for a calm and comfortable stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us!  We are so pleased you had a great stay at Extended Stay America. We truly appreciate your kind comments regarding our convenient location, friendly staff and comfortable suites. We will share your compliments with the team, especially Lexi. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!     Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The extended stay America hotel made my trip easy because It is near Disneyland, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. I would definitely book here again on the next family vacation in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I expected more for this property Check-in was normal - Check out was not Front desk person at checkout was out of uniform and doubled as housekeeping (long wait) Room seemed to be clean Good bed Some furniture pieces missing - some spotty drywall patching and paint Breakfast was just really free coffee (I can get the same at Motel 6)   Kitchenette was laughable - very bearbones  Very poor shower pressure and temp  Room was quiet  Might return to this property
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us. We are glad to read you had an overall positive experience and liked your room. However, we are sorry for the maintenance and service issues you encountered during your stay. We will continue to keep striving for improvements at every turn, and your feedback is, indeed, instrumental towards that goal. We hope you will give us another opportunity on your next visit to our area.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Rooms are good for the price & location is great! The walk to Disneyland in the morning is quick and it’s not too far away to come back and take a break in the middle of a busy Disney day. Would recommend staying here if on a budget!
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing to stay at Extended Stay America and taking time to write a review. It's great to know you found us to be a good value and that our location was perfect for your needs.  Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope you will visit us again.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Staff treated us extremely well the entire stay and it really is a quick walk to Disney from here! The only issue we had was a minor one with the key cards to the rooms and that was quickly remedied by staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The Good, The Bad and the Down Right Ugly
Summary: The Good: First let me say, If you are looking for beautiful, expensive furniture etc, room, you won't find it here. What you will find is a clean, decent room with older furniture and a full kitchen. The beds were comfortable, the full size refrigerator was cold, and all the appliances worked. Most of the staff are amazing and will make you feel welcome. You do have to clean your own room but the staff will give you everything you need.   The Bad: Breakfast.....if you can call it that. It is coffee, a granola bar and packaged oatmeal. If you are looking for a good breakfast, you will have to cook it yourself or go to a local restaurant.  The shower is very weak but it is hot. We could hear the children above us running around at all hours and the children next to us crying at 4
Manager Response: Thank you for the candid review of Extended Stay America and for sharing your comments regarding our well-appointed rooms and fully equipped kitchenette. However, we are disappointed to know that you had the convenience due to other aspects of your stay. We have taken notes of your concerns. We would welcome another opportunity to show you this does not meet our high standards and hope to see you the next time you visit the area.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel was really nice and clean, they have really awesome staff.’the workers are really nice and helpful! the rooms itself are really clean and nice they’re kept really well! I’d recommend staying here for Disney!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America. We are dedicated to providing a comfortable and pleasing atmosphere for all of our guests; therefore, we love that you had a pleasant stay. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to another opportunity to make your next visit a great one.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: If you’re looking for something cheap and clean, this room is a 10 out of 10! Free parking, my man and I were able to park both of our cars with out paying a dime! Staff was friendly and helpful! Will definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We are glad to know you were pleased with our courteous associates and liked our refreshing accommodations. We also appreciate you mentioning our complimentary parking. It was a pleasure to host you, and we look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Hotel was very clean. It was nice that we could open the windows.  The refrigerator was nice to have.  Having washers and dryers in the lobby was a plus.  We would definitely consider staying here again when we revisit Disneyland.  Parking was easy.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean rooms, short walk to restaurants. Perfect hotel for families.
Summary: We needed a hotel for our quick Disney trip and needed a kitchenette to make our daughters food. Found extended stay for a great low price. Room was super clean. Beds were comfortable. The girl down at the front desk was very helpful and accommodating whenever we had questions or needed something. We were able to walk right across the street to the toy story parking lot to catch the shuttle bus to Disney for the 2 days we stayed. Only a 3 minute walk versus a 20 minute to the park. It’s also a short walk to Anaheim garden walk to restaurants. We will definitely stay here again on any future visits!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We are glad to know you were pleased with our courteous associates and liked our refreshing accommodations. We also appreciate you mentioning our convenient shuttle service and location. It was a pleasure to host you, and we look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Easy parking, nice room, clean bathroom, and beautiful access to the ART.  Friendly staff and love being g able to make our own meals in the room.  Plus they have free grab and go breakfast.  Super close to Disney and family friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is really nice and clean and the front dest employees are soo nice!! definitely come stay here it’s nice clean and friendly! i’ll definitely be back here! it’s right next to disney!! so close!!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We are glad to know you were pleased with our courteous associates and liked our well-maintained property. It was a pleasure to host you, and we look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Very close to Disney! 4 minute drive, 17 minute walk. Nice new bathtubs, comfy beds, nice kitchens. Dishes, pots & pans are all given to you if you don’t have them! Close to a bunch of restaurants and stores in case you need anything last minute Nice, clean rooms. Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: our stay has been really good so far. i love the room very roomy and clean. anything ive needed they have for me. very good service as well. and very friendly. i would recommend staying here again. thank you
Manager Response: amandamV5756LI, thank you for choosing Extended Stay America and sharing your experience. We are glad you were pleased with our immaculate accommodations and with the service our associates delivered. It will be our pleasure to share your kind compliments with our team. Thank you once more for your kind review. Please come back and see us again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Next time i will just move the vomit-covered sheets to hallway to get there attention.
Summary: Recently returned from a 5 night stay here. I understand this is not a luxury hotel, I was not expecting amazing service and spotless rooms. What I was expecting was a basic response to my request to replace all bedding and towels after I got really sick in the early hours of Sunday morning. I cleaned-up, stripped the bed linens into a pile in the kitchen floor. Just after 9:30am, I went down to the desk to let them know what happened and that I needed it cleaned. The guy behind the desk did not seem to think it was as important as I did and said that they were going to be busy that day and not sure that they would get to it. It would require biohazard steps. He wrote it down on a notepad and said he would do his best. (!) When we returned to the room, (12 hours later). The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your recent stay with us. We work hard to provide a fresh and comfortable environment along with seamless service to our guests; therefore, we are sincerely sorry for the housekeeping issues you encountered and for not being as responsive as we should have been in working to address your concerns. Your comments have been discussed with the appropriate members of our team, and we have taken corrective action to ensure prompt responsiveness going forward. We are grateful for your patience and genuine feedback. We hope you will consider giving us another chance to prove we are up to the task of delivering exceptional hospitality and accommodations.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Yay to upgrade room but dirty room
Summary: We got this hotel for Disney. It was our first Family trip to Disney. The hotel looked nice on the outside on the pictures posted. When we arrived, they said they upgraded our room to a bigger king size bedroom. Yay! It had a mini kitchen - stove, micro & fridge which was nice. But the room didn’t look clean and it smelled like pee. there was a syringe under the bathroom sink, the pillows looked like they just plopped them on the bed. I checked the sheets, they had stains. I think there was a dog in that room because we noticed there was dog food on the floor and the floor was very sticky. It made me feel gross. I tried calling the front desk but when we arrived was past 11PM and no one answered. The next day, we told Front desk- the guy looked like a manager and he was sorry
Manager Response: Thank you, Michelle, for your stay and your feedback. We have read your comments and are sorry to hear we did not deliver a fresh and clean suite during your stay. We are very passionate about providing our guests with clean accommodations, and we apologize we fell short in this case. We have shared your comments with our housekeeping team to see where we went wrong so any necessary improvements to our processes can be made. We do hope you give us another chance when you return to our area as we would appreciate the opportunity to provide you with an excellent stay.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Was a great deal and close to the park. The room  was very clean and well air conditioned.  Was happy that they had good WiFi. The staff were super friendly .  Could use a couple more pillows but not a big deal.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It’s Dirt Cheap, So Expect The Dirt
Summary: Truly one of the worst experiences I’ve ever had in a hotel in a LONG time. The room was filthy and smelly (though not as smelly as the halls). I put a jacket over my pillow and slept over the covers. The bed was so hard, I didn’t even notice I fell asleep on top of my iPad.  The only plus was the younger members of the staff who were as helpful and nice as you could reasonably expect them to be. The more seasoned staff, however, was rude and unhelpful. I CAN say that the vending machines were reasonably priced, so there’s that, at least.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for the cleanliness issue you encountered and regret the inconvenience caused. Your feedback has been discussed with our housekeeping team to ensure we are diligent in our efforts moving forward. We also wish we had the opportunity to address the problem you had with the bed while you were here, as we would have done our best to ensure you were comfortable. Please allow us to regain your trust by staying with us again whenever your travels bring you back to this area.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: - Staff went beyond their call of duty.  - Never once saw a housekeeper. - Never cleaned our room, so we never received cleaned towels or toilet paper.  (stayed Friday thru Monday.)  - Dirty.  - ROACHES!!!!!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your recent stay with us and for taking the time to post your review. We sincerely apologize for the service and housekeeping issues you experienced. We have procedures in place so these types of situations do not occur. Regrettably we failed during this process and for that we are sorry. We can absolutely do better and we hope you will give us the opportunity in the future to prove that to you.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Great place. Great friendly staff. Decent amenities. Clean place. Decent grab n go breakfast. Closer to many shops n restaurants.  Overall we had a great experience during our stay of 5 days.  It's just a quick walk from the Disneyland park.  Good find
Manager Response: Thank you for making Extended Stay America a part of your travel plans. We are glad you were pleased with our immaculate accommodations and with the service our associates delivered. It will be our pleasure to share your kind compliments with our team. We are also delighted to read you enjoyed the breakfast that we had to offer and that our location worked well for you. Thank you again for your review. We look forward to your next visit!   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Economic option around the corner from Dsney parks. The staffs were friendly. Rooms were well maintained even in this pandemic times. One place they could improve is by adding some fruits to their grab-n-go breakfast. But thats not a big deal. Over all decent stay for us.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had mixed reactions coming to Disneyland. We stayed for 3 days. The staff was friendly. Room was clean. Breakfast was to-go. Very limited choice. There was mini muffins first day, but rest of the week was just granola bars, chocolate milk packets & brewed coffee or tea. Pool was not available so that was disappointment for kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We are happy to know you liked our cordial associates as well as your well-appointed suite. However, we regret the disappointment your kids had with our pool being closed due to the current circumstances. On behalf of everyone here, we look forward to welcoming you back soon for an even better experience.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: DO NOT STAY HERE. I was trying to go to Disneyland on a budget so I stayed here expecting it to be at least clean but it was not. A big spider and hair in the bed and stains in the sink. Stains on the lamp and writing under the shade and tears in the headboard. Overlooking a pool and rv. Doors said nonsmoking but room stunk of cigarettes and we had to go buy disinfectant spray and febreeze to handle the smell and feel of the room. They charge for late check out and there is nearly no WiFi or cellular reception in the rooms. Will not stay here ever again. Not worth it.
Manager Response: Please accept my sincere apologies for our hotel not living up to your expectations. Cleanliness is a top priority to all of our employees, and we do not take cleanliness issues lightly.  We will address this matter with our head of housekeeping and with the department associates in order to ensure changes are made immediately to solve these problems.  Please note, we adhere to a strict 'no smoking' policy and enforce it with a cleaning fee when we find evidence of smoking in a guest room. We appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention and apologize for the inconvenience this caused. We hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to serve you in the future, and we do hope to welcome you back again soon. Safe travels.     Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Such a Magical Experience! Lovely Staff and Hotel
Summary: This is the nicest hotel I have ever stayed in! The hotel is neat and lovely, walking distance from Disneyland and GardenWalk. The staff won over my heart. Toni is the kindest and most wonderful person I have ever encountered. Everyone was super accommodating with whatever I wanted or needed but Toni went above and beyond. He double check the room to make sure everything was perfect for my family's visit. Everything was up to par. The hotel was welcoming when I had a guest over and they are pet-friendly, they even gave my granddaughter her first Disney pin. The one night stay left an everlasting impression. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone who wants the full magical experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel starting to look very nice, stayed here once a couple years ago and this time around there was new paint. Looked very nice. Only downside is that it doesn’t seem very family friendly, only due to the type of guest that stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback. It is a pleasure knowing your visit with us was an enjoyable one.  We hope to see you again soon at Extended Stay America.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Staff is super friendly and very helpful! I have a client I go see here and she had issues and they helped her right away. They're very nice and clean and offer free sanitizer in the lobby too! Good stuff!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your kind review of Extended Stay America.   Our goal is to provide an exceptional experience for each of our guests.  It was a pleasure to read about the service you received from our staff. They will be pleased to hear their efforts are noticed and appreciated by our guests.   We hope you will stay with us again the next time you visit Orange County.     Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: My night and extended-stay Anaheim was one of the best nights I’ve ever had. Every time I need to stay in Anaheim I always stay at this hotel because of its convenience and great price. The staff is always friendly and willing to help thank you for making my stay that much better.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was very friendly and helpful. I had a family emergency and they had no problems at all giving me a refund on my last day. The rooms are clean and have everything you need. Only suggestion is to put the dog bags in the designated area. I had my own but it was empty, and the potty area was full. Other then that it was a great stay and I would book here again. The location is great as well. I was able to walk to Downtown Disney in a few minutes with my grandson.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America and for your terrific review. We are glad we were able to accommodate all your requests and that you were pleased with our immaculate accommodations as well as courteous service. We also appreciate your constructive feedback as it helps us improve our guests' experience going forward. Thank you again for staying with us, we appreciate your business!  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The staff always goes above and beyond. The grounds are very well kept. Maid service is always willing to accommodate me and my family with the basic necessities. And all done with a smile. The hotel is located right in the middle of all major attractions and freeways
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel. I like the softener in the water. They got a great vending machine. So great! Short walk to Disneyland ! Also right next door to this lit spot with a bunch of lights. I love the kitchen too!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you had a great time with us and that you were impressed with our ideal location and hotel amenities. Thank you also for highlighting our fully-equipped kitchen. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: It was a simple nice quick check in type of hotel
Summary: The employees were really nice. I like how the place was clean and provides kitchenware when you wanna use the stove. The parking was easy and medium This beauty is a size . Plenty of space to pick from.
Manager Response: Patricia, thank you for posting a review of your time at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you had a relaxing stay at our well-maintained hotel and that you liked our courteous associates. It was a joy to be included in your travel plans, and we hope you will be back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 3 months for an internship. The front desk team were all incredibly helpful and very nice. They accommodated all our requests and even made sure we got our mail. Staying at a hotel for as long as we did is hard but our place was clean, comfortable and the team always helped if there were any issues. Its a bummer we’re hear during covid because most places are closed but It’s also close to food places and short walk to the garden walk. Will definitely book here again especially when Disney opens.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest while you were here for an internship and for taking the time to review your experience at Extended Stay America. It is nice to know you found your suite comfortable and you were pleased with the exceptional service from our staff. We work hard to provide high levels of service, so we will share your compliments with the team to let them know their efforts are appreciated. We are also happy to know our location was perfect for your needs. Thank you once more for choosing our hotel, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We booked a king room for one night. When we arrived there were no more king rooms available. They were very kind and gave us an upgrade to a suite. The room is very clean. Would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Brianna, thank you for posting such kind comments about our hotel. We are thrilled to know you loved your suite upgrade and had a comfortable stay with us. It was a pleasure serving you, and we look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: My 1 month old and I stayed here for a night. The front desk ladies were super nice. My room, not so much. I was on the 1st floor, and my window wouldn't shut, there were tons of ants/spiders. And everyone if very loud. My sin was stolen up by someone playing their music way to loud.  Other than that,  it was a good one night place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our hotel and sharing your review. Although you liked our front office associates, we apologize for the cleanliness issue you had in your suite. We will share your comments with our housekeeping and pest control teams for their review and action. Moreover, we are sorry for the disturbance you experienced. We wish we had an opportunity to address this and make your experience a relaxing one. We hope you will allow us to accommodate you once again.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: With everything going on, you could stay here at the extended stay of America in Anaheim - Orange County. Worry free due to how clean and sanitizing, they are definitely taking precautions on our safety.
Manager Response: We are delighted you chose to stay with us at Extended Stay America. We appreciate your wonderful comments and are happy to read you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to exceed our guests' expectations and make sure they have a relaxing experience in comfortable, clean accommodations. Reviews like yours make it all worthwhile. Thank you for being our guest, and we look forward to your next visit.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I want to thank all of the employees here for being so nice and welcoming to my family during some difficult times. Toni really makes the property even better! The rooms are nice and the kitchen is great for my little family.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We are glad to know you enjoyed your time with us and that you were impressed with our apartment-style accommodations and courteous associates. We will be sure to share your kind compliments with Toni. Thank you for choosing us, and we look forward to seeing you and your family again soon!  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This place was so beautiful and amazing! The front desk people were so helpful and very nice! The hotel itself was super clean and pretty and it was all for a great price! I really enjoyed staying here and I would definitely come back!
Manager Response: We enjoyed reading your comments and want to thank you for sharing such a lovely review. It was a delight to know you were not only impressed with the service provided by our courteous associates but also our immaculate property and that you had a comfortable stay. It also was a pleasure to know you liked the great value we offer. Thank you for selecting Extended Stay America, and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We have been here 3rd time and it is great just like we’ve expected. Great service and clean room. We are definitely looking forward to choose this hotel as our very next destination for our holidays.
Manager Response: Thank you for always making Extended Stay America your home away from home. We are delighted to know you had a great stay once again and that you are impressed with our courteous associates and well-maintained accommodations. It is always a pleasure hosting you, and we cannot wait for your future visit.  Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: Staff well trained the price is in believable. My go to every time I need to get away.Has everything around it CVS Walgreens 7 eleven easy access to a couple different freeways, Angels stadium downtown Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for always making Extended Stay America your home away from home. We are delighted to know you had a great time with us and that you found us to be a good value. Thank you for highlighting our ideal location and courteous associates. It is always a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel is average, I would say it needs a little bit of cleaning once you first arrive. The hotel supplies kitchen appliances if needed, which is a plus. The AC and fridge make a lot of noise, but the TV and all lights work, faucets and shower head work. Overall the room is decent.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. We are pleased overall you had a pleasant stay, but we are sorry for the housekeeping and maintenance issues you experienced. We have taken note of your comments and have shared it with the appropriate teams so we can improve our service and facilities going forward. We hope to see you again soon so we can make it up to you.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Super good quality service, private rooms makes you feel like you can be yourself. Very clean and organized. Loved the room and the fast internet, worked well with my gaming. AC kept us cool on the hot day outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Extended Stay America and for the kind feedback. We are glad to read you enjoyed our well-appointed accommodations and the great service delivered by our courteous associates. We appreciate your kind recommendation and look forward to your future visit.   Sincerely, Hotel Managemen

Summary: Staff was very nice! Rooms were comfortable! everything was clean, just a small lack of towels. Check in and out was easy. Just sad the pool was closed! booo covid. Would recommend though, and would most likely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America and for the kind feedback. We are glad to know you had a nice stay and that you were impressed with our ideal location and courteous associates. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Thank you for the recommendation.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We came to this hotel knowing how extended stay is and I was surprised with the Pins they had laid out for their guests. I stayed in the 2nd floor and it has been very quiet and homey. I recommend this place for anyone!!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a guest at our hotel and for sharing your views with others. It was delightful to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay at Extended Stay America. We love to make our guests feel at home so it is wonderful to hear that we accomplished that goal. Thank you once more for recommending us to future guests, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Just checked into the hotel and the best thing ever happened, we got free disney pins just because this place is awesome! we have been to several extended stays recently and this one is the biggest and the rooms are pretty nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America. We are pleased to know how much you liked your suite. We want your stay with us to feel like home and be as comfortable as possible. We appreciate your kind review and hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Staying hers 10 days and service has been great. Easy to communicate and any issues they take care of it right away . Really appreciate the simple fast service. I .at 3 front desk service a d each one is helpful.  Great for long term or more the. 9 day stay
Manager Response: Thank you for making Extended Stay America your home away from home. We are happy to know our staff has been taking good care of you and that you are enjoying your time with us. We want you to have a pleasant stay, so please let us know at the front desk if there is anything we can do to make your stay better.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I checked in just before 3pm and was greeted as I came in. Friendly staff overall. I went up to a clean room and fresh linens.  There was a notice stating that they provide utensils if you need them but when I went down to see if they had any, gentleman at the counter said he hadn't washed dishes so there wasn't any.  So I had resorted to going to 7 eleven down the street to buy some. Not a very bad thing but I could have easily waited if he decided to go and wash some.  GardenWalk is within walking distance around the corner as well as Disneyland, Downtown Disney, Anaheim Convention center, and 7 eleven.  Overall a good stay. I'll just have to be more prepared next time to use their kitchenette if making my own meals.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay at Extended Stay America. It is a pleasure to know you were satisfied with our courteous associates and your well-kept suite. We are also glad to read that our prime location with easy access to Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center, and other various attractions of the city worked well for your plans. However, we regret we missed meeting some of your expectations concerning the availability of the dishes. Your comments have been discussed with the appropriate individual to make sure such mistakes do not happen again. We value your feedback and look forward to your next visit.      Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I'm partial to ESA, having worked in one prior. The customer service was amazing and the room was very clean. Every question I had was answered professionally and in a timely fashion. The Anaheim location is definitely one of my new favorites.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America, and we appreciate your loyalty to our brand. We are thrilled you were impressed with your immaculate suite and the prompt service provided by our associates. Your compliments will be shared with our team to recognize them for a job well done. We value your business and look forward to hosting you again many more times.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I came around 130 am last night we were able to check in and be able to wake up and refresh and continue our road trip!. The shower water is was hot the could not to the breakfast do they provided lunch
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us at Extended Stay America and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to know you were pleased with most aspects of our property and that you had a memorable time with us. We value your business and look forward to seeing you along with your family again in the future.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This was a great hotel and had nice amenities. I stopped here on a road trip. I want to come back here and stay when we go to Disneyland since we have a fridge and a microwave. The only downside was the system was rebooting late at night so we had to wait about 20 minutes to check in
Manager Response: Thank you for making Extended Stay America a part of your travel plans, and we appreciate your kind review. It is a pleasure to know you were thoroughly satisfied with our refreshing property and the thoughtful amenities we offer. However, we regret the delay you experienced during check-in. We value your feedback and look forward to welcoming you again on your next visit to our area.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This is my second time staying at this location, I usually book extended stay every time I come to LA. I have never had any issues and the staff here are very helpful! Our bathroom tub was clogged and they gave us another room as soon as we told them. Thank you for the stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to stay at Extended Stay America. We are glad you had a pleasant experience and that you were impressed with our service. We appreciate your patronage and look forward to welcoming you both back soon.  Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: This place has incredible amenities for the price. It is the only hotel I will be staying from now on. I felt right at home and they are pet friendly. Long or short stay yhis place is worth it but I would only book online.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending Extended Stay America to future guests and for letting us know you found us to be of good value. We are glad we could make you feel at home and that you loved our amenities and pet-friendly feature. We look forward to being your home next time you are in our area.  Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: If I wasn’t so picky on my surroundings and comfort zone this would have been fine, however with the building itself you can hear everything on the bottom floor including loud doors closing and rattling the walls, and conversation and snoring through the walls. The manage was understanding and discounted my stay which I was grateful for. I didn’t like all the homeless walking on / through property.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay with us. We apologize for the noise issues you experienced and the inconvenience this caused. After investigating all of the details, we hope we were able to address your problems while you were here. We appreciate your feedback and invite you to visit us again so that we can make a more favorable impression.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Stayed while transitioning during a move
Summary: I was just looking for a cheap place to stay a couple nights in between moving for my daughter and I. The guy at the front was awesome and made sure we have anything and everything we needed, and the hotel itself is nice, considering how cheap it was. The people here were nice, and everyone kept to themselves. Even at night, it was quiet. I was nervous with having my daughter with me, but she loved it and I felt safe here with her. Definitely glad I chose this hotel, and will definitely considerate it in the future if need be.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at Extended Stay America. We take great pride in delivering excellent service so reviews like yours assure us that we are meeting that goal. Our staff is committed to making sure that our guests enjoy their stay so thank you for appreciating their efforts. We loved hosting you and your daughter and we look forward to being your home again in the future.  Sincerely,   Hotel Management

Summary: I love this place, its a great location for families, its a nice place to stay if your traveling, I've stayed at extended stay multiple days on end and I have never regret it, I love coming here with my girlfriend
Manager Response: Thank you for being loyal to our brand and hotel. It is great to know how much you always enjoy your stay with us. Our goal is to provide our guests with an exceptional experience, so we are thrilled we have been successful in doing so during your visits. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you and your girlfriend soon.  Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: My opinion of Extended stay America' Hotel.
Summary: Exceptional service. Great low prices. Best bang for your buck. The bed was comfortable and the towels folded like swans at end of bed when first entering the room was neat And clean as well. For the uptight yuppy you probably would complain about the thread count of sheets and be petty about stuff that really isn't a big deal. But for the grateful regardless economic status would be grateful and enjoy themselves. I can only speak for myself and i think the chair in the corner next to the window is super comfortable. The bed did its job as a bed. Just wish i had a coffee maker. Unless its in a cupboard i didn't see it. But a coffee maker would make this a perfect stay for the perfect price. Eat at the pizza place across from 711 on harbor and katella supah bomb bub.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to learn how much you enjoyed your guest room and that you slept well on our comfortable beds. Our staff does a wonderful job maintaining our accommodations, and it will be a pleasure sharing your kind remarks with them. We are so glad you found us to be of great value. We appreciate your generous review and look forward to your future visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Moved to California and staying here until our apartment is ready, front desk staff was super friendly and helpful when checking in. Room is nice and clean love having the mini kitchen. Excellent location to so many things, walking distance to Disneyland (if only it was open 😷) lots of restaurants and shopping near by as well.
Manager Response: It is our pleasure to accommodate you at Extended Stay America, and we appreciate your glowing review. We are delighted to know you are impressed with our cordial front desk associates and well-appointed accommodations. Thank you for mentioning that our ideal location with proximity to many eateries and points of interest worked well for your plans. Please enjoy the rest of your stay.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: definitely will be coming back here for disneyland when it reopens! 💕 I really enjoyed my stay at this place, it had a kitchen, good tv channels and not those crappy ones that you have to keep flicking lol! Thank you for a good night 💕
Manager Response: It was our pleasure having you as our guest at Extended Stay America, and thank you for sharing your review with other travelers. We are enraptured to know our well-appointed accommodations with scenic views exceeded your expectations and made for an elevated experience. We will gladly share your positive feedback with our team and look forward to hosting you again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Stayed at hotel for a personal visit and other thsn loud people upstairs, everything was great. Would definitely return visit, and stay longer next time. Comfortable room comfortable bed had everything I needed
Manager Response: We appreciate your fantastic review of Extended Stay America and for being our valued guest. Thank you for sharing your remarks about our comfortable accommodations. Our housekeeping team does a great job of caring for our rooms, so we are thrilled to share your nice comments with them. We thank you once more for giving us the opportunity to serve you, and we look forward to providing you another comfortable stay in the future.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I loved everything about it . It’s really quite and calm also very clean . I don’t have any complains .This is my second time staying in this hotel I would stay again five star hotel . I will be coming back .
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about your most recent visit to Extended Stay America. We will be sure to share your review with all of our associates. Thank you again for making us your home away from home. We look forward to your next stay and until then, wish you safe travels!  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights with my friend and it was a good experience. The room was clean, fresh, and I love that it comes with a full fridge to keep my food and drinks cold! Staff was very friendly and helpful to my needs. It’s very close to Disneyland which is great. I recommend staying at this place, also rates are also cheap.
Manager Response: Your kind comments and excellent rating are greatly appreciated by all of us here at Extended Stay America. It was delightful to know that the services provided by our associates and the comforts of our accommodations exceeded your expectations. Thank you once more for recommending us to future guests. We look forward to hosting you again soon.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Nice friendly staff, Nice hotel, comfy beds and pillows.   The hotel is under a mile walking distance from Disneyland and there is great pizza place on the way back from Disneyland open late the pizza press.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at Extended Stay America. We are glad you liked our cordial staff and comfortable beds. We are also delighted to hear our convenient location close to Disneyland was perfect for your needs. Thank you once more for reviewing us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Decided to visit LA last minute & spontaneously to enjoy Disney. We love love loveeee the kitchen and being able to cook our own breakfast before a long eventful day. The location is also walkable to the Anaheim Gardenwalk right around the corner, super affordable & most importantly clean!  However, in our bathroom we were only given the one roll of toilet paper to use. And rather than having extra in the room, they were downstairs behind the front desk lol I’m assuming it’s bc of the shortage from the corona virus 😂 other than that no complaints
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at Extended Stay America while you were here to visit Disneyland. We are glad you liked our kitchenette and well-kept property. We are also delighted to hear our convenient location close to the Anaheim Gardebwalk was perfect for your needs. Kindly note, in-room amenities and other items such as toiletries are available and complimentary at the front desk. It is our goal to deliver exceptional value at a fair price, and we like hearing that we have accomplished just that. Thank you once more for reviewing us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: For the price I’m amazed at what comes inside the hotel . Fridge , stove , sink , and microwave. Will definitely return when visiting Disney again !  Celebrating my baby’s birthday my kids loved the room !
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America during your visit to Disney for your little one's birthday. We are glad you and your kids enjoyed your stay, loved your suite, and the well-equipped kitchen. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to seeing you all again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Kitchenette was a big plus. A good walk to Disneyland. Free Parking
Summary: This is one of the lowered priced hotels in the vicinity of Disneyland. It's a good place to stay and can save you a lot of money. This is one of the hotels that offers free parking, other hotels charges $18 for parking even if you are checked in to their hotel. The kitchenette was a big plus since you can cook your own food. I used it a lot during my stay here. Disneyland is about an 18 minute walk. Breakfast is grab n go, they offer muffins and granola bars that you can take with you  I just wish they have a mini gym. I recommend this place especially if you like to save money.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Extended Stay America during your recent visit. We are delighted to hear you had an enjoyable stay, and our location close to Disneyland was perfect for your needs.
