It is also nice to know you loved having a well-equipped kitchen in your suite and the grab-and-go breakfast.  Moreover, we are glad that you found us to be a great value. Thank you also for recommending us to fellow travelers, and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Chose this hotel because it isn't too far from Disneyland and because it has a shuttle service but turns out you have to pay for it so we just walked. It's about 20 min walk to the park not too bad going but going back after a long day at the park is a different story. The hotel itself is pretty good. The kitchenette served it's purpose. Utensils are available upon request. Just bring your own dish sponge, they provide dish soap. They also have laundry for $3+ and dryer for $2+. They also offer room service but for extra $.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Extended Stay America during your recent visit. We are glad our location worked well for you and that you appreciated being so close to Disneyland. Also, we appreciate your comments about our fully equipped kitchen and on-site laundry. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The room was much bigger than expected to be it was nicely cleaned as well and the front desk was very polite and professional. The location is perfect especially if your visiting Disneyland how I am is a very short drive to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting Extended Stay America for your recent visit and for sharing your comments. We are pleased everything went great for you during your visit and that our wonderful location made it even better. Also, our team was delighted to learn you found our accommodations well-kept, and the staff friendly and professional. Thank you once more for being our guest, and we look forward to seeing you in the future.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great room for a good price
Summary: The room is nice, well kept and clean. Spacious, and the bed is very comfortable. We enjoy the space of the kitchen as well as the size of the bed. Only issue is the smell in the hall way and humidity.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America and sharing your experience. We are glad you enjoyed your suite offering apartment-style living with lots of room to relax, and many extras that make traveling easy. We are also glad that you found us to be a great value. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to having you stay with us again.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Front desk attendant Bernice was very helpful she Check me in with ease! Had an issue checking in with my 3rd party company but she helped me resolve it in a timely manner. The room is really big and clean great deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to read that Bernice went a step beyond to make your stay more comfortable. Your compliments will surely be shared with her. We are glad that you found us to be a great value. We love being able to provide our guests with comfortable accommodations at a fair price. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel was in a great location and came with several things the more expensive hotels didn’t have like free WiFi, a continental breakfast, and a kitchen. It wasn’t the fanciest place, but it was great for the price and had everything we needed. We would definitely come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay at Extended Stay America. It is a delight to know you had a comfortable stay and liked our convenient location. Also, we are glad that you found us to be a great value. We love being able to provide our guests with comfortable accommodations at a fair price. Thank you once more for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to hosting you again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: It was a excellent stay here at extended stay  service at the front desk were very friendly  and helpful  when I ask for for service like extra plates and  extra blankets they provided them with no questions asked
Manager Response: It is nice to read your positive review of your recent stay at Extended Stay America. Our goal is to provide our guests with exceptional service, so we are thrilled we were successful in doing so during your stay. Your comments have been shared with the front desk team, and they were very appreciative of your recognition. Thank you for being our guest, and we look forward to your next stay.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I had a great stay.good hospitality.service was great .service was friendly I felt right at home I recommend  you stay here on your next vacation many sites around that you can visit when you stay at the Anaheim convention extended stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your terrific review of Extended Stay America. We are happy to have surpassed your expectations with our outstanding service. Reviews like yours encourage the team to keep up the good work. It is also nice to know you liked our convenient location. Thank you also for recommending us to fellow travelers, and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Great location to Disneyland Resort, only a 15 minute walk. rooms were of decent size with a fridge and mirowave. friendly staff and overall a nice place to stay at especially if travelling with children.
Manager Response: Thank you for evaluating your recent stay with us. We are glad you had an overall pleasant stay, liked our friendly staff and our spacious suite with kitchen amenities. It is also nice to know our location close to the Disneyland Resort was ideal for you. We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon on your next visit this way.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Rooms at the hotel were clean and decent in size with a fridge and microwave. Staff were friendly and able to assist with questions. Hotel was approximately a 15 minute easy walk to Disneyland resort.
Manager Response: Our gratitude for reviewing your stay at Extended Stay America. We are glad you had an overall pleasant stay, liked our friendly staff and our spacious suite with kitchen amenities. It is also nice to know our location close to the Disneyland Resort was ideal for you. We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon on your next visit this way.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Upon checking in we were greeted by Toni who checked us in.  He was friendly and professional.    The hotel room was perfect size,  clean,  comfy, I appreciate the a/c and option to open windows for natural air.   Also fun fact,  the front desk does pin trading #disney #disneypins and the pins were different! They had Ursula and Tinkerbell!   What a great way to start our weekend getaway to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your weekend at Extended Stay America.  It's nice to know you found your suite comfortable and you were pleased with the exceptional service from Toni. We will share your compliments with him. Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Hotel was ok. The staff is awesome. Amenities in the rooms were great. Stove, microwave and refrigerator made it easy to not have to eat out everyday.  Hotel is decently kept up. Somewhat strange that they charge for room clean up, but all in all not bad.
Manager Response: Eddie, thank you for choosing Extended Stay America. We are glad to know you were impressed with our courteous associates and liked our fully-equipped suite. Kindly note, to respect the privacy of our guest housekeeping service is done once a week. We are happy to offer this service to you at a minimal fee.  We value your feedback and look forward to welcoming you both back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: When I was looking around for hotels , this one is perfectly located to Disney. I love that they include breakfast and have a mini kitchen in the room. Overall great quality for the price. Go with this place first.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you found us to be a good value and that you were impressed with our fully-equipped kitchen as well as with the ideal location. Thank you for the fantastic review, and we look forward to seeing you both again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The Extended stay America Anaheim was good For the price, we were pleased with the accommodations. The staff is also helpful and friendly. The grab and go breakfast was ok, but it is only a little basket with muffins and small crunch bars.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you found us to be a good value and that you were impressed with our accommodations as well as with our courteous associates. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Our stay here was good. It’s a good budget option - about a 20 min walk to Disneyland or a 5 min Lyft or Uber ride. ART picks up outside too.  Great if you want to be able to bring your own food for your trip - kitchen has fridge, stove & microwave. Only complaint is the pine tree air freshener- not pleasant!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We are happy that overall you enjoyed your stay and found us to be a good value. We are also glad you liked our convenient location close to Disneyland and the fully equipped kitchenette in your room. We value your feedback and hope to welcome you back.   Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: At first we were a little skeptical due to other reviews but once we got here we changed our minds completely we were greeted right away and the rooms are better than described, the lady at the front desk was very nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Bryant, thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. It was a pleasure knowing you had a comfortable stay in your well-appointed room and that our courteous front office associates left a remarkable impression by delivering excellent service. Your praises will be shared with our team. Thank you once again for stopping by, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: best hotel ever stayed here twice in a row!!! i love this hotel and will continue coming, Good service... they helped me after i check out with a cake and milk to be kept in a cooled area so they wouldn’t go bad. Thanks Again Extended Stay Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Christian,   Thank you for returning to Extended Stay America. There is no better compliment than a guest who keeps coming back time after time! We are so glad you continue to enjoy our hospitality. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you all back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This is my second stay here & I do plan on staying here for more visits. Great (walking) distance from Disney (10-15 min walk). The front desk workers are very welcoming & help us out on any questions we have.
Manager Response: Kimberly, thank you for choosing Extended Stay America once again. It’s a pleasure to know you continue to enjoy our ideal location as well as the service provided by our courteous associates. On behalf of everyone here, we invite you all to revisit us on your next trip to the area.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: My stay at Extended Stay American
Summary: Friendly staff and very close to Disney. Lots of noises during the night not sure what they are. Vending machines have good snacks but it's only on the first floor. This is hotel has a kitchen which is pretty nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your feedback with future travelers. It’s a pleasure to know you liked our cordial associates as well as our proximity to Disney. We are also glad to know you were impressed with our fully-equipped kitchenette facility. However, we regret the noise issue you faced. We wish we had the opportunity to address the problem while you were here. On behalf of everyone here, we invite you both to revisit us for an even better experience.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: My husband and I recently relocated here in Anaheim and we weren't able to move into our apartment just yet so we stayed here, because it's by my new residence and Disneyland of course! I definitely recommend staying here. You won't spent a lot but will still have nice amenities and courtesy Disney shuttle.
Manager Response: Kat, thank you for choosing Extended Stay America. We are glad to know you found our location ideal for your needs and enjoyed our refreshing property. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to hosting you both again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel is clean and staff is friendly. Only thing I didn’t like is there is no house keeping! Other than that I recommend staying here. Very close to the parks for walking and a quiet place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are pleased you had a great stay at Extended Stay America while you were here for your Disneyland trip. We truly appreciate your kind comments regarding our convenient location, friendly staff, and comfortable suites. We appreciate your recommendations and look forward to welcoming you back soon!    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Good generally a few minor things tho.
Summary: The room size was good and fridge and kitchen was fine and a decent walk to Disney. But i did get bugged when the kitchen didnt have utensils and room service was extra and the hall smelled like a pizza hot pocket. Still a bang for your buck.
Manager Response: Thanks for posting a review so future travelers can read about your pleasant experience here at Extended Stay America. It is delightful to hear how much you enjoyed your stay, and we are happy you were impressed with our convenient location, spacious suites, and kitchen amenities. However, we regret the inconvenience you experienced due to our policies and odor in the hallways. We value your feedback and look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Great value for nice rooms with kitchenette to prepare meals for our days adventures. Within walking distance to nice restaurants and a  easy walk to Disney and Convention Center. Looking forward to next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at Extended Stay America. We are glad you liked our kitchenette and clean rooms. We are also delighted to hear our convenient location close to Disney, restaurants, and the Convention Center was perfect for your needs. It is our goal to deliver exceptional value at a fair price, and we like hearing that we have accomplished just that. Thank you once more for reviewing us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Tried this Extended Stay for the first time, and I was impressed from the moment we walked in. The room is spacious, and the addition of a kitchenette gives more options when it comes to food and beverages. The bed was comfortable as well, leading to a great night’s sleep. I can’t recommend it enough.
Manager Response: Roman, thank you for the glowing review of Extended Stay America and for recommending us to future travelers. It’s a pleasure to know you liked the spaciousness of our suite and were impressed with our fully-equipped kitchenette facility. We are also glad to know you slept well on our comfortable bed. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you both back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Excellent service clean friendly great trip will stay again! The room was nice and big. I brought my instapot and saved on dinner staff provided me with clean utensils, pan and spatula for other meals. Close to house of blues and Disneyland
Manager Response: It was a pleasure hosting you both at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you had a great stay and that you were impressed with our spacious accommodations, ideal location as well as with the excellent service delivered by our associates. Thank you for the fantastic review, and we look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I made a reservation for Cheer Nationals to watch my daughter's school perform there. I was driving to Anaheim, and I received a call when I was two hours outside of Anaheim, that the hotel was overbooked and my reservation had been canceled. I don't understand how a single parent gets bumped when they have a reservation. Do they use darts to decide who gets bumped when they overbook the hotel?
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback, and we are sorry our hotel was overbooked and unable to accommodate you. We offer no excuses for this mix-up, and we apologize for the inconvenience. We understand the frustration and truly hope you will offer us another opportunity to serve you.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Great service and nice big rooms!!  We love that we could leave are car parked here all day while we enjoy Disneyland since it isn’t to far!! Only downer is the elevator smells funny lol Thank you ☺️☺️☺️
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We are glad to know you were impressed with our accommodations as well as the wonderful service delivered by our courteous associates.  We also appreciate you highlighting our complimentary parking facility. Thank you for your comments, and we hope to see you both again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: No early check in available but we enjoyed our three days here. The room was clean and night staff was very friendly! There is a fee for room cleaning so make sure you keep the room tidy. Overall not bad! Also enjoyed the coffee and snacks provided.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Extended Stay America. We are glad to know you had a nice stay and that you were impressed with our accommodations as well as the courteous associates. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you and your friends again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, fridge and clean!
Summary: Perfect for a last minute trip. So close to Disney, clean rooms and great rates. Everyone is super friendly and it was so easy to find. My husband and I enjoyed every minute of our trip. Thank you extended stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback of Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you had a great time with us and that you were impressed with our ideal location, spotless accommodation as well as the great value we offer. Thank you also for appreciating our associates. It was a pleasure hosting, and we look forward to seeing you both again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: On day 2/4 and so far has been a great experience with a close distance to Disneyland! Also provides delicious muffins and coffee in the morning. I’m happy we received a first floor room, after all the walking I have been doing, it’s definitely needed.
Manager Response: Your outstanding review of Extended Stay America made our day! We are delighted to know you are having a great time with us and that you are impressed with our ideal location as well as the breakfast choices. It is a pleasure hosting you, and we hope you both will enjoy the remainder of your stay.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We were looking for a cheaper hotel close to Disneyland and extended stay was a good choice. Our room had a leaky toilet and the breakfast served was very small. Other than that the staff is helpfull.
Manager Response: Brianna, thank you for making Extended Stay America a part of your Valentine’s Day Disney trip. We are glad you appreciated our reasonable price and friendly staff. However, we are sorry for the plumbing issue you encountered during your stay. We have shared your comments with our maintenance team to look into it. We will make a note of your feedback as we plan any changes to our breakfast. We hope to welcome you again whenever your travel brings you to our area.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Very convenient location, and service was spectacular.  It was a Valentine’s Day trip to Disneyland with my girlfriend and myself.  We were looking for a hotel that had great service, good rooms, and near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Alejandro, thank you for choosing Extended Stay America for your valentine’s day trip. We believe that excellent customer service, our prime location, and a well-kept suite makes us an amazing choice. On behalf of everyone here, we invite you both to revisit us on your next trip to the area.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Oversold and left me on the street
Summary: This place is THE WORST.   I booked a room on Priceline and they say they are overbooked   What a joke.   Like how can you be over booked.  And they are doing nothing for me.  They say it’s Priceline fault but Priceline says no way it’s the hotels....  Mike at the front desk would not help me.  He was so rude.    Get rid of this guy ASAP
Manager Response: We are sorry our hotel was overbooked and regret not being able to accommodate you. It was never meant to cause any discomfort to you. We offer no excuses for this mix-up, and we apologize for the inconvenience. On a positive note, we are glad our team made a reservation for you at our sister property. Please consider giving us another opportunity to host you and replace this experience with a much more positive memory.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Sad to say - but extremely poor experience
Summary: I am only leaving a review because I hope it will encourage this hotel to take better care. I love to write positive things only, but I have never had such a bad experience as this, so I feel the need to provide constructive criticism.   1. This hotel markets itself as a non-smoking hotel, but our room reeked of smoke (even the shower curtains!) It looked like the floor even had smoke stains on it.  2. We tried to switch rooms, but the gentleman at the front desk said there was nothing available, which was truly hard to believe. I do not believe he was the normal front staff for the hotel, so I imagine he probably wasn't sure, so he just said they were full. 3. We tried to ventilate our room by opening the window for fresh air even though it was freezing in the room and outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for not living up to our commitment to clean, fresh, well-maintained accommodations during your visit and are also sorry we were unable to provide you with another suite to your satisfaction. We are a non-smoking hotel, but on a rare occasion a guest does not comply. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention, and we will share your feedback with our housekeeping and maintenance teams for review and action. Please know, hairdryer for your suite is available at the front desk upon request. Also, we will share your comments regarding the pillows and beds with the appropriate team so that they can take the necessary steps to make the future guests experience a better one. We hope to have another chance to redeem ourselves.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: 1. Range hood light didn't work.   2. Bathroom door squeaks  3. Shower tub peeled/chipped   4. Mattresses squeak and not comfortable, you feel the springs.  5. A/C noisy  6. Sprinklers in room not installed correctly.   7. Sheets and pillow case stained/dirty.  8. Fridge didn't work   9. Only granolas @ the grab n go coffee stand.   10. Not courteous at all. They don't greet you nor, at least, say good morning.  11. Using the extended perks gave me a worst room.  12. Requested another room and said they were booked and couldn't help us.  13. Not staying here ever again and don't recommend it at all!!!
Manager Response: Francisco, we were disheartened to read your review. Please accept our sincere apology for the problems you encountered. You deserved a comfortable and stress-free stay, and we did not live up to your expectations. Thank you for bringing these matters to our attention, including the prime one concerning the sprinklers. Your feedback will be shared with our team to prevent such problems going forward. We hope to receive an opportunity to regain your confidence in us.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Cleanliness is clearly not their priority or a highly held standard. We were attending a hockey game at Honda Center & decided to book an overnight stay. While Front Desk staff was great, the cleaning staff is poorly lacking. On the morning of our departure, we found another woman's earrings in our bed. The earrings were tucked between the fitted & flat sheet, which leads me to believe the sheets were not changed; otherwise, they would have seen/felt them when placing the flat sheet over the bed. We spoke with a manager who said we'd have to speak with the general manager. We have yet to reach her & they have not reached out to us. Would not recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, please accept our sincere apologies for our hotel not living up to your expectations. We do not take these concerns lightly, especially with the housekeeping service in your room. We will address this matter immediately with our team to come up with solutions to avoid this experience in the future. We hope you will reconsider giving us another opportunity to serve you.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Cheap hotel and very nice staff. Stayed close to Disney and other local spots!!! Willing to stay again highly recommend!!! Also rooms were very clean and very comfy! AC worked well and house keeping was very clean!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking time to review your experience at Extended Stay America.  It's nice to know you found your suite comfortable and you were pleased with the exceptional service from our staff. We are also glad to read our location nearby Disneyland and local attractions worked well for you. Thank you for recommending us to future guests.  We look forward to hosting you again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Very Disappointed! Review of Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center Pending review  Was this suppose to be a hotel? I must have missed what this was as it was not up to any expectation I had of a hotel near Disney. There was no maid service. We returned from Disneyland after a long day and everything was how we left it that morning. The "hotel" needs to save their money on that breakfast. There were packaged muffins. There was coffee. There were packages of instant oatmeal and hot chocolate but no offering of hot water, or bowls or utensils. There were no utensils, bowls or cups in the mini kitchen in our room either so I am curious how we were suppose to enjoy the hot chocolate or oatmeal? The 4th floor hallway had a horrible stench. Not sure what
Manager Response: We truly apologize for the many difficulties you faced during your stay with us. The housekeeping and maintenance teams have been made aware of the problems you described and we will ensure these are taken care of. We also regret the disappointment you had with our grab-and-go breakfast and hotel policy. Kindly note, as per our brand standard requirements, we keep the kitchenware at the front desk rather than leaving them in the rooms. We will be sure our front desk communicates this more clearly going forward. We are also sorry if our housekeeping policy was not shared with you at the time of your check-in. This service is done on a weekly basis to respect the privacy of our long-term guests so as to offer minimal intrusion. We hope you will consider giving us another chance to prove we are up to the task of delivering excellent service and accommodations.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Hotel had what we needed. Pet friendl for our fur kids.Nice and welcoming staff.Clean and great  location to entertainment and restaurants. Easy access to the highways.  Well priced. Family trip to Disneyland and california adventure.
Manager Response: We are honored that you brought your family here during your trip. It’s great to know you were impressed with our staff and that our location nearby entertainment and restaurants were perfect for your needs. Thank you for reviewing Extended Stay America. We look forward to having you all back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I really loved this place.  The good: Nice and quiet! This place is kept nearly immaculately clean! I had a kitchenette and everything was in order. One thing to note: the tapwater tastes funny, so you may want to bring your own. TV worked great, great quality, easy guide. Hotel is about a half mile from Disneyland, you can walk, rideshare or bus over. Staff was friendly and helpful.  The bad: More communication on what buses or shuttles go over to Disneyland would be great. I didn't realize there was a bus that went THROUGH the parking lot until the end of my 2nd day here - after walking back from Disneyland.  My freezer had some weird tapping noise in it when it would turn on - I thought it was a kid next room over playing at first.  I would definitely come back and stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for the detailed review of your stay at Extended Stay America. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us and that you liked our ideal location with easy access to Disneyland as well as the service delivered by our associates. However, we are sorry we missed meeting some of your expectations. We have taken note of your feedback and have shared it with the appropriate team. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Decent for the Location, Needs Improvement
Summary: We got this hotel as a Hotwire Hot Deal and it was super cheap. Think under a hundred bucks. For walking distance to Disneyland, it was a killer deal. The room was decent, looked to be recently updated. There was ZERO hot water the entire trip. It got to warm-ish at the very best, but never got HOT, not even in the sink in the bathroom or kitchen.  Decent microwave and fridge. We didn't use the other kitchen amenities though. Bed was decently comfortable, pillows were hard. A/C unit worked well. Decent TV.  Don't be fooled by the "free breakfast". It's more like "free breakfast snacks" as it's just oatmeal, granola bars, tiny mini muffin and coffee and cocoa. So though we had thought it was a continental type breakfast it was not, so if you're figuring that into your budget you
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. Although you liked our ideal location and were happy with our affordable rates, we are sorry for the issues you had and that you were unhappy with our grab-and-go breakfast. Your comments about it will be shared with our brand leaders to assist them when determining new breakfast offerings. We urge you to choose us again as we are confident your next stay will be a much better one.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Good if you like dirty, dated, dingy spaces
Summary: One absolutely gets what one pays for here. It's my own fault, really, booking on a bargain site in the hopes of saving a few bucks. I should've just stuck to my brand, but sometimes the desire to be frugal rears its ugly head, and I have to obey...and end up paying for it.  This hotel is tucked away off a main street, so it's quiet in the area, which is about the only positive I can give in this review.   Check-in was a disaster, with the one girl working the counter choosing to ignore us to finish her "what did you do last night?" conversation with the co-worker hanging out over the counter.   The stairwell we took to and from the car was dank and dirty, with tissue and chip bags and soda cans hanging out on every landing.  The hallways had a stink to them, which permeated
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of your stay. We apologize for the service and cleanliness issues you encountered and regret the inconvenience it caused. Our promise to our guest includes a commitment to providing a clean, fresh environment, so we regret the inconvenience you had while here. Your concerns will be shared with the appropriate individuals in our organization so that this does not repeat. Thank you again, and we hope to have the chance to serve you better in the future.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Not worth the time or money
Summary: My girlfriend and I booked this room for a Family Reunion picnic nearby as we drove up from San Diego. We thought it was a steal, until we arrived. We were told that even though I booked a non-smoking room, the previous guest smoked in it. *I absolutely hate cigarette smoke* All they did was open the windows, spray air freshener and gave us an extra can of air freshener to get rid of the smell since they didn't have any other rooms available. The room came with a kitchenette, but there was absolutely NOTHING it it. You had to request anything you needed. No silverware, no dishes, no dish detergent, NOT EVEN GLASSES OR A COFFEE CUP or coffee maker!! Who runs a business like this? Then when I would go to the front desk.....No Clerk and NO NOTE. One of the times I arrived at the
Manager Response: Kevin,  Thank you for the review of your stay. We are sorry for the disappointment you had with our dishware policy and for the smoke issues you encountered. Your feedback will help us enforce our no-smoking policy more effectively so that, this does not repeat in the future. We also apologize for the service issue you experienced at the front desk and will share your concerns with the appropriate department to ensure a better experience going forward. We hope you both will return so we can make it up to you.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Room was okay, A/c didn't work well, stayed in room #124 did not smell good. Free Breakfast was, Coffee, Hot Chocolate, Oatmeal, Granola Bars, Small Muffin(Banana,Chocolate,Blueberry). Hallway was not even clean. stayed here for 8 day and not even one time that they come and clean our room.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We are sorry for the issues you encountered and regret the inconvenience it caused. Your feedback is of utmost importance, so it has been discussed with our housekeeping and maintenance department in an effort to improve our service levels moving forward. We also apologize for the service issue you experienced. Your comment will be shared with the appropriate team members to ensure this never happens again. Please revisit us so we can make it up to you.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Stood at the front desk which was vacant for 5 minutes. Finally saw the bell and rang it. Waited another several minutes and rang again, multiple times. After about a minute the most unpleasant woman came out looking clearly annoyed. Not once during the entire transaction did she smile. The room was really small. I was not asked what floor I preferred just given a key and room number.  Not one utensil, cup or plate is in the room. You must go to the front desk and ask for them. I wasn’t told this, or anything when I checked in. My grandchildren came to visit and we went swimming. On the way to the pool I asked for more towels, which I was given. Later, after my guests had gone home, I called the front desk to ask that they come and get the the wet towels. Who ever answered
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are disappointed to read your comments concerning your stay at our hotel. Please accept our apologies, as we never mean to disappoint our guests in any way, and we definitely failed in this attempt. We can assure you that what you experienced is not acceptable by our standards, and we will be taking the proper action to ensure a more pleasant experience for every guest entering our doors. Thank you again for your candid feedback as this helps us to improve the experience for future guests.  Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed here for 10 nights prepaid or definitely would have switched hotels after arriving. Couldn't afford to pay for another hotel after already prepaying for this one. Where to begin.. First room we got obvious milk spills or something all over carpet, sticky gross loose dirt, smelled bad. Went to pit clothes on racks in closet, willing to overlook carpet, even though my kids could not walk on it without shoes. The closer curtain had food splatter and who knows what else on it. Decided to take a peek at the beds after this. Peeled back the little mattress pad and was horrified. The zippered cloth mattress covers and both beds look like they had not been washed since being put in years ago. Pee and blood  stains and don't know what. Sticky counters and just dirty. Pictures
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for the cleanliness issues you encountered in your room and the smoke smell you experienced while you were here. Please be assured that we have shared your concerns with our housekeeping team to see where we went wrong, so necessary improvements to our processes can be made to correct our performance. Also, your feedback will help us enforce our no-smoking policy more effectively to ensure our future guests do not encounter such problem again going ahead. We would like to regain your trust and hope you will give us that opportunity in the future.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: When you walk in the awful smell of smoke and dirty carpets is so strong if it wasn’t so late I would leave!! The blankets are stained i won’t use it!! I don’t want to bring the one I brought because of the smell in the room it’s very uncomfortable i would not recommend
Manager Response: Stephanie,  We apologize for the odor and cleanliness issues which left you with a less than favorable impression of our hotel. Your experience is noted and has been brought to the attention of our housekeeping department. We assure you that remedial steps are underway so such issues don’t happen again. Please consider giving us a chance to redeem ourselves in the future.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Average hotel and room were okay.  Did not like the fact they gave me a handicap room.  It made taking a shower difficult.  Otherwise, it was okay.  Front desk personnel were nice.  No gym at the hotel.  Location is great.  It's a nice and quiet place tucked away from all the noise.
Manager Response: We appreciate you being our guest and providing your feedback. We apologize we were not able to accommodate you with the suite of your choice and for the difficulties you faced. However, we are glad you found our front desk staff friendly and liked our location. Thank you for your feedback, and we hope to have another opportunity to provide you with the suite you desire.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: the room was nice and clean the help was friendly and helpful has kitchen with stove fridge and sink  micowave, good tv the bed was ok there is a breakfast was grab and go so not much muffins and coffee was what I had
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments. We are pleased to know you liked our accommodations along with the fully-equipped kitchen and that you also appreciated our associates. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you both again in the future for a memorable experience.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We reserved a night here prior to our visit to Disneyland park. We didn't check in the hotel until late, after we had left the theme park. If it hadn't been so late we wouldn't have stayed here. Upon entering I immediately noticed how dirty the lobby floors were. The hallway and our room carpets were also very stained and dirty. The bathtub and kitchenette sink were having plumbing issues and weren't draining properly. The bed slept decent but I couldn't get past how dirty the place was. The parking lot was also littered and had a terrible smell. Would not recommend at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review of your recent stay. We are truly sorry that the cleanliness of our hotel was not up to par and that we fell short of your expectations. We want to let you know that we are already working to address the problems you mentioned. The cleanliness of our hotel is our top priority and your review lets us know where we need to refocus our efforts. So, thank you, and please consider staying with us again in future. We would love for you to experience our hotel at its best.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: unbelievable how dirty this place is! Smells of cigarettes and marijuana ALL the time.  Walls are paper thin and there is a homeless population living here(not sure how they afford the bill).   I used to have a good opinion of Disneyland and California, but this place actually convinced me to never visit this state again!  How can a hotel be managed so poorly yet portray to be “a great hotel”?! Believe me when I tell you there are zero positives to stay here! This hotel chain will ruin your fantasy image of Disney and California in one night. Rooms are dirty  Bathroom has black mold on walls Strong odor of cigarettes and marijuana in room, halls, stairwell, elevators..... Breakfast is a joke Dishes are dirty and I had to ask for dish soap which comes in ketchup sized packet The
Manager Response: Dear O4791FTling, thank you for the detailed feedback regarding your stay. We are truly sorry for your experience and for the poor impression we left upon you for the hotel, area, and state. Your comments are very important to us, as it will assist us in improving our guest experience moving forward. We will take the necessary steps to ensure this does not occur in the future. A clean, fresh, and pleasant environment is a must and it's clear we have some work to do. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to make this up to you should you return to the area.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Extended Stay America in Anaheim near Disneyland
Summary: Good location for visiting Disneyland. Bus transport in parking lot approximately every 20-30 mins goes to and from Disney. Hotel is clean and quiet, but basic. Kitchen had fridge and small cook top. Plates, utensils, etc available if you ask downstairs. No daily housekeeping included, but available for $10/day.
Manager Response: Dear Deborah,   Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are glad you were able to stay here and take advantage of all that our area has to offer. It was great to read that our hotel was just right for your needs. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to accommodating you in the future!            Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We chose to stay here due to the proximity to the park and the fact that they allowed pets (big thank you for that). The rooms are clean, the staff was very kind, and the location really can’t be beat. I think it took us about 15 minutes to walk to the park. The only reason this hotel isn’t five stars is because of the sad breakfast they offered. Only oatmeal, granola bars, and muffins. Otherwise, wonderful!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us at Extended Stay America. We're happy to know you were pleased with our pet-friendly hotel and that our excellent location worked well for your needs. However, we're sorry for not meeting your expectations with our grab-and-go breakfast. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: All I wanted was convenience and a good night’s sleep...
Summary: If you want that good night’s sleep do NOT go there. Service is terrible.  Since they are an “Extended Stay” and not a normal hotel, they cannot even open the door when you arrive at 2 am from the airport, it’s raining and 9 defrews outside, it takes you about 10 minutes to wake up anyone that can open the door. In the meantime you freeze to death.  On one side of the hotel you get the train tracks, on the other the freeway, on the other the freeway ramp. NO way to get a good night’s sleep, you can also hear your neighbour’s tv selection, food plates and trays on the hallway for days. If you have to do business in the Convention Center or plan on visiting Disney or anything else...look for another place! PS. Internet is TERRIBLE and cable TV does not have good signal.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for the issues you encountered and regret the inconvenience it caused. We are sorry not meeting all of your expectations, and please be assured that corrective actions are being taken. We are committed to making sure that we don't repeat what you experienced. Thanks again for your feedback, and we hope that you'll give us another chance and consider staying with us again in the future.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Very friendly front desk staff that makes you feel at home the moment you walk in the door and assist with all your needs.  Hotel is clean and is in walking distance to restaurants and Disneyland.  Look forward to returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your stay at Extended Stay America. We are thrilled to know you loved our courteous associates and that our great location was perfect for your needs. We look forward to welcoming you again the next time you visit our area.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I planned a two-night Disney getaway for my 2 sons and myself. We arrived on Thursday night, close to 9pm, and were met with very pleasant greetings and service. Completely pleasant, adequate room.   We jumped on the shuttle in the morning (a shuttle/bus network has the market on Anaheim - several hotels use this shuttle in lieu of having their own on payroll) so it was $9.50 per day for my two kids and myself. Shuttle runs every 20-30 minutes and makes a handful of stops. You don’t know quite when it’s arriving with a vague range, and the shuttle stop is a good 50’ from the lobby, so you’re hanging out for a bit outside, hoping you didn’t miss it.   We returned to the room for a few restful hours in the afternoon, and headed back out again. That night, with two exhausted kids,
Manager Response: Jaime, thank you for the glowing review of Extended Stay America. It’s a pleasure to know you had a great stay with us and loved every aspect of our hotel. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you all back soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Spend a little more money and stay elsewhere... dirty!!
Summary: I just checked out today, from staying for 3 nights. Upon check-in the man was very distracted and talking on the phone as he tried to check us in. He would ask us 1 thing then talk on the phone again, us again, then the phone. It was confusing and frustrating.  Our room then was filthy. The floor wasn't clean at all. Under the beds there were crumbs and some garbage, in the bathroom there was dirt on the floor and my puppy kept finding things to try and eat no matter how much I tried to clean it all up.  We also had stained blankets and on our first night we asked for a change of covers and they told us there were no extra blankets, but come down and they would check... No extra blankets? Come down? Really?? We went down and got two brown scratchy blankets but there was no
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your visit. We're disheartened to read about the problems you experienced, and we hope you will accept our sincerest apology for what transpired. We assure you that we have discussed your feedback with the concerned teams, and we're immediate steps to ensure future guests do not encounter the same issues. Please consider staying with us again for a much-improved experience the next time your travels bring you this way.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel is gross, ghetto and stinks. Do yourself a favor, spend a few extra $ and stay somewhere better. No extra pillows, they don't clean the rooms until you leave and the bath tub doesn't have a drain.    It's seriously so gross I'll never stay here again, or ANY Extended Stay. Very unimpressed.
Manager Response: Kylie, thank you for being our guest. Although we try to strive to deliver guests with an excellent stay, we apologize this wasn’t your experience. Your feedback for the odor is shared with the housekeeping team to do a deep cleaning of our property. Kindly note our housekeeping is done on a weekly basis to respect the privacy of our guests and offer them minimal intrusion. We hope you will give us a chance to redeem ourselves in the future.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Best Value For Our Disneyland Trip!
Summary: The hotel manager, Russell, and his amazing staff have made our stay welcoming and inviting! The attention to detail and professionalism of the staff made our stay feel like our ‘home away from home.’ They even went all out and gave the lobby a complete makeover for Christmas! It was a magical winter wonderland every day!  My daughters were looking everywhere for Santa!  The staff was helpful and kind. There is a bus stop in the parking lot that will take you right into disneyland’s Gates. The breakfast bar was great! They have various muffins, coco, coffee, tea, oatmeal, and granola bars. I would stick a granola bar in my backpack for an easy snack when we were in the park. We used the washers and dryers and the snack and soda machines. Also, we loved going swimming when it was
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your stay at Extended Stay America. We appreciate the flattering remarks and are glad you enjoyed your time with us. As you pointed out, our location is perfect in that we are very close to Disneyland. We want our guests to leave well balanced and with replenished spirits, and we are delighted that our associates enhanced your visit. Your review means the world to us! Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you all back.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: My first stay at extended stay all went great. The facilities provided are clean and arranged well that makes what a hotel room should be for comfortable stay. Kitchen and dining space amenities are at the best. The grab & go breakfast and many options of bars helps a lot. I would definitely recommend anyone looking for accommodation that is close to Disneyland in good walking distance and within budget.
Manager Response: On behalf of all of us here at Extended Stay America, thank you for the excellent review. We are thrilled to know how much you enjoyed our amenities and services. It’s also great to read you enjoyed our delicious grab-and-go breakfast offerings and loved our location. Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to providing you all with another enriching experience soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We travel a lot I read over the amenities everything seemed ok for our needs however no  housekeeping daily you have to retrieve your own towels stains on the carpet and just a antiquated place that needs updating I wish the pictures you see online were from current day not from when it was new sorry we won’t be using this hotel again and it’s not like your saving money your just getting less of everything you would normally get at what I would call normal hotel stay customer service goes a long way I will be doing the only thing I can do and spend my money elsewhere to prove my point good luck to those that choose this hotel
Manager Response: Please accept our sincerest apologies for the issues you encountered during your stay with us. To respect the privacy of our guests staying for long periods of time, our housekeeping service is conducted on a weekly basis, although we are always happy to provide you this service at your request for a minimal fee. Also, we will use your feedback to improve our future guest's experience. Once more, we do apologize and hope you will afford us an opportunity to redeem ourselves in the future.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: BEWARE!!! THEY MOVED ME THE DAY I WAS TO STAY ROOM BOOKED 5 MOS IN ADVANCE
Summary: I am so shocked that one Assistant Manager could do such a thing.  I booked my room July 22, 2018.  There is a convention in town and there are little to no rooms and ones available are $200 or more a night.  I booked for $139.99.  This morning 12.03.18 while finishing up work.  I was left a message that there was a plumbing issue and Jonathan the Assistant Manager had decided that I along with 6 other guests were being moved to Cypress which is approximately 30 minutes with NO traffic from the Anaheim location.  I booked this room because it was right next door to the other family members that were going to be down in this area for our annual Holiday visit to Disneyland.  Not only was I told that I would be in Cypress, but when I tried calling for over an hour all I could reach
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to leave feedback. We apologize for the unpleasant experience. You deserved a comfortable and stress-free stay, and we assure you that what you experienced is not typical. However, we would need more information to address your specific concerns. Please do not hesitate to contact our general manager directly if you would like to discuss this matter in more detail. Thank you for being our guest, and we hope you will consider staying with us again. Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Perfect recovery spot from a week in vegas.
Summary: this hotel is GREAT! I arrived late afternoon from a huge drive from Vegas and the lovely lady behind the desk was so lovely, explained everything. Extended stays Anaheim is walking distance to Disney land & the Anaheim garden walk. the facilities are clean and well presented not overly new but does what a hotel room should. I would highly recommend anyone looking for accommodation that doesn't blow the budget, to stay here.
Manager Response: Jade, thanks for recommending us to others in your 5-star review. We are thrilled to read you liked our excellent service and that you experienced a relaxing stay in your well-maintained room after your tiring journey. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to welcoming you all for another outstanding visit at Extended Stay America.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Never again at this Extended Stay!
Summary: Been to other Extended Stay Americas - this one was the worst. Burn marks on rugs, furniture veneer was blistered and peeling. No hangers so I went down to the front desk. All I got were three - that's what each room gets, she says. This is Extended Stay America, isn't it? I'm here for five days. I have 4 shirts and four pair of pants how do I store them? I ask where is the closest store where I can buy more? She gives me three more.
Manager Response: Thanks for being our guest. We sincerely apologize for not meeting your expectations with regard to your room while you were here and the service you received from our front office team. Your feedback is of utmost value, so it has been discussed with appropriate team members in an effort to enhance the quality of our service and facilities going ahead. Please consider giving us a chance to provide you with a better stay.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We decided to give Extended Stay America 4/5 Stars.  Great location and great room but kind of bummed about the lack of room service and the murder.  We did not expect to come home drunk to a crime scene.    Great service.  Okay water pressure.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to leave a review. We apologize for the unpleasant experience during your recent stay. We hope the positive aspects of your visit will encourage you to choose us again in the future.  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: A perfect recovery from Extend Stay America Anaheim
Summary: I stayed at an Extended Stay America in Sandy Utah and it was the worst experience I've ever had at any hotel. Something removed from my room, miscommunication from the Front Office, and people staying there that shouldn't be. I was a bit concerned staying at another ESA, but I had a great stay in Anaheim. No one knew about the issues I had in Utah so the great service I received was genuine. They have a friendly office staff, great parking, and located way close to Disneyland. Around 9pm, I had a few family members over for pizza and of course I didn't have any utensils so I went to the front desk and without hesitation, the gal gave me plates and glasses at no additional cost. She saved my butt in a pinch. My room was pretty darn nice with a good sized livingroom and great
Manager Response: Mark, thank you for choosing Extended Stay America and sharing your review with us. We are thrilled to read you were impressed with the service of our courteous staff and had a relaxing stay in your well-appointed room. Thanks once more for the comments, and we look forward to serving you on a future date.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Location was great, very cheap for a good walking distance to Disneyland resort! The 1 queen bed room was very spacious for 2 people. Right across good restaurants like Bubba Gumps or Cheese Cake Factory. 10/10 would stay again.
Manager Response: Ernest, thank you for taking the time to share about your stay at Extended Stay America. We are thrilled to know you the value we offer and that our great location was perfect for your needs. We look forward to welcoming you again the next time you visit our area.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Extended Stay America Orange County seems to be a hotel that caters to business travelers. The room where I stayed in did not have the typical long-stay amenities in spite of its of kitchen and dining spaces. Nevertheless, my room was clean and in good order though the bathroom supplies could still be improved. Location-wise, it felt like being in an island as there were no adjacent restaurants or places of interest. Maybe the property is serving a specific purpose which I am not really a part of. That being said, I don’t think I would stay there again unless my purpose of visit is right within its vicinity. Good thing it has competent and professional staff who could perform within the property’s operational limitations.
Manager Response: We are pleased to see you enjoyed your stay with us. To ensure cleanliness of kitchenware upon check-in, brand standards require us to make these items available at the front desk rather than leaving them in the suites, and our team gladly delivers them to your suite.  Your feedback is appreciated, and we will remind our front desk to communicate this more clearly going forward.  It was our pleasure accommodating you, and we look forward to seeing you again!  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The Extended Stay Anaheim was without a doubt the cleanest, most convenient we have ever stayed at. This would include 6 different Extended Stays in California alone. The staff was so helpful and friendly . We were only about 5-10 minutes away from all the attractions. We also felt we were in a safe location. Thank you to all. We'll be back.
Manager Response: Karenhe, we appreciate your loyalty to our brand, and we are so glad we could welcome you at our hotel.  it's great to know you were impressed with our outstanding service and that our location was perfect for your needs. We look forward to welcoming you back   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: First stay at extended stay. There is a funny  smell. The floor is sticky with some substance on it. Booked through Booking.com. No room service at all. Size of room ok and has microwave and refrigerator.
Manager Response: Julie, first and foremost, we would like to offer you our apologies for the inconveniences that you experienced during your stay with us. Your concerns have been immediately brought to the attention of our housekeeping for review and action. We are also sorry if our housekeeping policy was not shared with you at the time of your check-in. This service is done on a weekly basis to respect the privacy of our long-term guests so as to offer minimal intrusion. We hope you will give us a chance to impress you on a future visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: If I could give this hotel zero stars I would. I booked my stay here from 10/5 to 10/7 through hotwire using one of their fire deals so it was not my choice to stay here and I did not want to stay at this hotel in the first place after reading alot of the reviews this hotel got. I got to the hotel and left after being there about two hours. The elevator had trash and fluids on the floor and The hallways did not look any better. The outside of the hotel looked nice but inside is severly run down but the worst part was the room I got.  The room was a mess there was white residue on all the tables and counters and it had a funky smoke smell. I found a lighter and pieces of glass or plastic in one of the kitchen drawers from the previous tenant. The bathtub had a blood stain in it
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to leave feedback. We apologize for the unpleasant experience. You deserved a comfortable and stress-free stay, and we assure you that what you experienced is not typical. Unfortunately, financial inquiries on reservations made through a third party, pre-paid booking site, must be made through them, and we suggest you contact them directly. Thank you again for being our guest, and we hope you will consider staying with us again in the future. Hotel Management

Summary: I enjoyed my stay, but a couple things I want to point out so that hopefully the property can improve.   + First of all, the other reviews are right.  Though it is a non-smoking property, the hallway does reek of cigarette smoke. That is disappointing. Although my room was non-smoking, and you didn't smell any smoke in it, thankfully.  I have been at another ESA somewhere else, and the whole room reeked of smoke despite non-smoking.   + They are very low on staff.I had a need at the front desk the morning of 9/19. I heard the man at the counter identify himself as "Jonathan, the AGM--assistant general manager."  He was juggling answering the phone, and taking care of me at the same time.  Unfortunately, he paid more attention to the ringing phone than to me holding my credit
Manager Response: Sarah, thank you for your constructive review. We're sorry for the inconvenience you had while you were here and for the service issues you encountered during your stay. Please be assured that we have shared your feedback with the appropriate individual in our organization, and we're taking immediate actions to be more diligent with our efforts going forward. We hope you will consider giving us a second chance the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel hallways smell of stale smoke, the carpets are dirty and stained. Once inside our room; for a room that was supposed to be smoke free, it had a very strong odor of smoke. We were told house keeping was not available as our stay was only for three days, so we did not qualify for house keeping. The bath towels were small and rough.   Our vehicle was broken into in the parking lot. The manager offered us a broom to sweep out the broken glass and he called the police although sympathetic no real assistance was offered. In speaking with the police officer that responded they offered the following advice "only if you can find no where else to stay, should you stay here". Car break ins, car thefts and drug deals are a common occurrence at this and the adjoining hotel. The
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to voice your concerns. The security of our guests and their property is of utmost importance, and it is extremely concerning for us to read your comments about theft. All reports of missing items are taken very seriously and steps are taken to investigate all claims, big or small. Please be assured that our management team has been working to prevent future incidents of this nature. Thank you again for being our guest, and we would love the opportunity to welcome you back again soon. Hotel Management

Summary: I would genuinely not recommend this place. We picked it because we got points for our card and it was close to Disney Land but this place was gross! Dirty rooms and the kitchen was covered in grease. Please if you can, stay somewhere else.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for your unpleasant experience during your visit. As the cleanliness of our hotel is a key priority, we are very sorry your room fell short of your expectations. We have checklists in place to inspect every suite after it has been serviced. We will revisit our deep cleaning program so that we can provide a much better experience in the future. We hope you will consider a future stay as we would welcome the opportunity to regain your trust.  Sincerely,	 Hotel Management

Summary: Clean and recently updated rooms. Kitchen has full size fridge, a stove, sink, and plenty of cabinets so long term stays are definitely feasible. Location was perfect-walking distance to Disney and less than a block from numerous restaurants. Located one building off the main road so couldn't hear traffic at all! Parking is included with your room as well. No room service so have to ask for fresh towels and sheets but not a big deal to me.
Manager Response: Michael, thank you for the perfect feedback of Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you were so impressed with our well-appointed suite along with the fully-equipped kitchen and that our ideal location worked well for your needs. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to welcoming you & your friends back soon.   Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: Front desk manager was helpful and listening to our concerns. Room was good with great view to Disneyland fireworks. Each night we had a free show of fireworks and my kids enjoyed that a lot. Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you were impressed with our front desk associate and that you loved the great view from your room. It was a pleasure accommodating you & your family, and we look forward to welcoming you all again.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel looks decent online.  PROS - they gave us snacks candy and waters upon arrival! That was good - shuttle 5.00 per adult convenient - close to Disney!  - shuttle was every 20.00 mins and reliable until 1230am  - a lot of hot water - restaurants close  walking distance and tasty  - the ac was Great!!!  CONS Now prepare yourself -dirty rooms -dog hair from previous people- dog hair on chairs  -sheets didn’t seem clean or crisp -hair on the bed sheets -dirty tub -dirty floors in the kitchen and the whole room -sink and counters were dirty -dust and pet hair all over the floor under the bed  -no dishes or utinsels you have to ask for them which is is inconvenient  -you have to ask for more towels and sheets bc they don’t have room service  -they won’t do a wake up call they
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We take these matters very seriously and appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Your feedback will assist us in our efforts to continually improve our service and guest experience. We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better stay in the future. Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Unsafe and Has gone down hill
Summary: I lived in this Extended Stay for 4 months several years ago and had no issues at the time. It was a clean, furnished place to stay for a reasonable price. Unfortunately the Extended Stay has let themself go. Part of the room seemed renovated (bathroom shower/counter) but the rest of the room was falling apart. Safety and security is also a huge issue. The homeless population of Anaheim is given what seems like free reign over the property. Our second day there I was followed to the room and money was demanded. Multiple vehicles parked onsite with people sleeping in them. Drug deals by the pool. We originally had a 6 month stay booked and left after 1 week. No one even took the time to ask why we were leaving. I would avoid this hotel until they figure out how to secure the
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for taking time to leave feedback. You deserved a comfortable and stress-free stay, and we regret that was not your experience. We take the safety and security of our guests and their property very seriously, and we will take the necessary actions to ensure this is properly addressed.  Hotel Management

Summary: I actually really enjoyed my stay here. I was nervous because I spent a lot of time reading some not so good reviews, but I was pleasantly surprised on the quality of the room and facilities. The ONLY negative I encountered was the A/C did not blow very cold, but the weather wasn't too hot during my stay, so I never felt the need to press staff to fix it during my stay or move me. My trip started off on a positive note when I called the front desk the day of my arrival to see if I could check in a few hours early. I was delighted to hear I could, so we left Disney to go check in and get set up in our room. I accidentally booked a single bed room and needed a double, and though they were out of double bed rooms, they had a roll away for an extra fee. The microwave and stove top
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you and your family loved most aspects of our hotel and that you were impressed with our fully equipped kitchen. It was a pleasure hosting you all, and we look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed in a suite with our four kids and it was perfect! Lots of space, clean, large refridgerator, stove, everything you need to be comfortable. Free full breakfast in the morning. The food and variety was very good. You do need to drive or take a shuttle to Disneyland though. It is a bit far to try and walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America and for the wonderful feedback. We are thrilled to know you and your family loved your well-equipped room and that you also appreciated our delicious grab-and-go breakfast. It was a pleasure having you all as our guest, and we look forward to hosting you again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Nothing Great but Somewhere to Lay Your Head Down
Summary: Basic hotel. Free parking which is a huge plus in the area. Room was adequate. Only 3 pillows on the bed? I have never seen that before. Room was clean. The elevator was a little noisy. It said free breakfast.. that's a joke. Granola Bars and Muffins. Please change this so it is not deceiving. If you get a good price then stay here. Otherwise look somewhere else.
Manager Response: Thanks for evaluating your experience at our hotel. We are pleased to read you liked many aspects of our hotel and had a comfortable stay with us. However, we are sorry for the disappointment you had with our breakfast. Your feedback will be shared with our Brand Leaders to assist them when determining new breakfast offerings for future implementation. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again on your future visit to our city.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Perfect for a Disney vacation on a budget!
Summary: We stayed 2 nights while visiting Disneyland. The ability to cook in the room and store all our snacks in the fridge/freezer is a HUGE money saver for a family! It's within walking distance of Disneyland, although there is a paid shuttle service available for getting to the park (the shuttle isn't affiliated with ESA.)   The room was clean, the staff was very friendly and our kids loved the pool! We even watched the Disney fireworks from our room window both nights. I would definitely recommend this ESA location to anyone visiting Disneyland or the convention center.   We were provided with a stay here to facilitate a review for my own website.  A positive Trip Advisor review was NOT required. All opinions are 100% my own.
Manager Response: Thanks for making Extended Stay America a part of your travel plans. We are thrilled to know our location was perfect for your trip and that you were satisfied with all that we have to offer. It was so good to have you here, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Stayed 4 nights to go to Disneyland, it was a short scenic walk.The staff at this hotel was extremely accommodating and I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone looking for an affordable hotel within walking distance to Disney.
Manager Response: Kayla, thank you for staying at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to read you liked our convenient location and reasonable rates as well as courteous service. We appreciate you recommending us and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This is our first family trip to Disney. We drove from SF and we’re looking forward to just get into our nice room and relax. Well we didn’t! We get there and we waited 1hr for them to find the room we wanted which Was booked over a week ago. Then they said they do not accept cash when they clearly have a sign that says we accept card and cash. Front desk do not have customer service and don’t know what their doing but Haleigh was the only nice lady their. Then on top of that our room was completely disgusting! The bathtub so black not even kidding and I have children that’s just not ok! We asked for someone to clean the whole room immediately and no one came instead they moved us from different room. They need more employees that are not lazy and get things done! This place
Manager Response: Luisa, our number one priority is to make sure you have a comfortable stay, so we sincerely apologize for the cleanliness and service issues you experienced during your stay. We truly regret the inconvenience these caused. We never want our guests to leave unhappy, and we are sorry for letting you down. We appreciate the feedback as it will help us to improve our future guest experiences. We hope you will give us another chance to demonstrate the excellent service we strive to provide every guest.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: room was nice and clean.  needed a room for an overnight stay for work.  The management and staff were very helpful with my reservation.  I received a call from the front desk after I got into my room asking if everything was to my satisfaction and if there was anything they could do to make my stay more enjoyable and comfortable.  I would highly recommend this hotel to friends and family.
Manager Response: Jack, thank you for taking time to review your experience at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to read you found your suite comfortable and you were pleased with the exceptional service from our staff. We will share your compliments with the entire team. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Good hotel with nice competent staff. Room was comfortable and very quiet which I appreciate!  See you again in December. Can’t wait until TV are upgraded to HD and HBO.  Convenient to Disneyland and Knottsberry Farm.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We are pleased to know your stay with us was comfortable and that our location was ideal for your needs. It was a pleasure having you here, and we look forward to seeing you again in December.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Gave us a dirty room that was not ready. Hallway smelled like cigarettes and dirty dog. And a lot of the other guest looked like druggies. Didn’t feel safe. Also the outside looks nice but once you go inside it’s a different story. The lobby was also not the tidiest. We decided not to stay and go somewhere nicer.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We take these matters very seriously and appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will take the necessary actions to ensure these issues are properly addressed. Hotel Management

Summary: I have used Extended Stay America in the past with great results. Even if some reviews I read online mentioned that this location was not clean, I found it to be in excellent conditions. Personnel at front desk (Jolene and Velma) were always helpful and attentive to our needs, and overall this was a great stay for me and my family. At walking distance from Disney, with a nearby Walmart and El Super, this location is privileged. The cherry on top of it all was being able to watch Disney's fireworks from the room every day!
Manager Response: Rodimiro, thanks for choosing Extended Stay America for your stay. We are thrilled to know you were impressed with our well-maintained property and that you also liked our affordable rates. We will surely share your compliments with Jolene and Velma. It was a pleasure serving you, and we look forward to hosting you again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This was our first experience with extended stay America. Very happy with overall experience will definitely consider staying there again. Loved that our room had a small  kitchen. Perfect for a family trip
Manager Response: Thank you for rewarding Extended Stay America with your wonderful review. It feels so good to know you were happy with the comfort of your well-appointed room and that we were we were able to meet your expectations at a great price. Thanks once more for your positive comments, and we look forward to welcoming you both again soon to your home away from home.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Is a very nice hotel, not worth what we paid, but because it's close to Disneyland I understood , even though we didnt go to Disneyland , restroom was not great, seemed like it was for a handicap person
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at Extended Stay America. We are glad to know you had a good time here and loved the convenience of our location. We hope to be your hotel of choice every time you visit this area.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed only one night and had 2 small dogs. The room was pet friendly and Eco friendly. They had a pet yard with cleanup and waste disposal supplies provided.     If we needed anything for the kitchen or bath it was available at the front desk.  Breakfast bar items were coffee, tea, cereals, bars, muffins, etc.  There were vending machines for phone chargers, laundry soap, snacks, sodas and water. We noticed that it was preferred by families and was quiet. The bed was comfy and they had bath tubs (yay!)which, to our chagrin, we had to request at a famous,remodeled, high end hotel down the street. I would recommend the Anaheim ESA.
Manager Response: Thanks for choosing Extended Stay America and recommending us to others. We are thrilled to read you were impressed with your well-appointed room and that you liked our pet-friendly policy. Reviews such as yours mean a lot!
