Thanks once more, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Economical hotel very close to Disney, however....
Summary: There are pros and cons to this hotel.  I will start off by saying that the staff is always very nice.  The manager, Russ, tries to always accommodate, and the rest of the staff does what they can to make sure you have a good stay.  I have been staying here off and on for more than a year, and do so for the economics of it, and because many places do not let you book consecutively for more than a month.  I want to state that of all the Extended Stay America's I have stayed in, this is the best one to date.    Pros - Economical, friendly, perfectly located walking distance to Disney (2 blocks).  Lots of restaurants very close, Walgreens and CVS right down the street.  Close to Starbucks, 7-11.  Right off the 5-Freeway.  Easy access to the 22, 55, and other connectors for LA and
Manager Response: Spencer, thanks for evaluating your visit to our hotel. Although you liked many aspects of our hotel, we apologize for the odor issue you came across while being here. Your experience is shared with our housekeeping department to do a deep cleaning of your room. We have strict policies where we prohibit smoking in some areas so we appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we can address it appropriately. Your concern regarding our breakfast will be discussed with our Brand Leaders when updating our selections moving forward. Thank you for being our guest, and we hope you’ll choose us again on your next trip to our area.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Stayed here for a trade show in March 2018. It was our first time here. Great location to walk to convention center, Disney and the Galleria. Very friendly staff. Decent rooms. Great value. Would recommended it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the four-star review of Extended Stay America and for sharing your experience. We are glad to know you had a great stay and that you liked our convenient location ideal for your needs. We appreciate you for recommending us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: - Unfriendly & unhelpful staff  - Low floor rooms are noisy (Rooms close to the main entrance    and the pool)  - The hallways smell bad (Not fresh) and sometimes people     smoke cigarettes so you can smell that all over.  - Elevator's used to move trash and they smell bad.
Manager Response: Abboud, thank you for being our guest. Unfriendly and unhelpful staff is extremely concerning, and we have discussed your feedback with our team members. We also apologize for the unpleasant smell that compromised your stay. Steps are already on the way with our housekeeping team to ensure they cleans the mentioned area thoroughly. We wish we had an opportunity to address your concerns while you were here as we would have tried our best to make your stay experience enjoyable.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: For the sake of your health, avoid.
Summary: Very close to convention center, so I thought I'd save some money and try out Extended Stay America.   However, upon entering room it smelled very bad.   Like "drop everything and go get a different room" type of bad.   Except they were full.   Citrus Febreeze became my best friend for 4 days.   Clientele was very noisy from various rooms.  Hot water took about 15min to get to come out.   You get the idea... if you want to save $$ near convention center / disney  -- find a place away from the action and take an Uber.
Manager Response: David, thanks for being our guest. We're sorry for the inconvenience you experienced due to the odor and the noise issue in your room. We will revisit our deep cleaning program to see where we can make improvements so future guests are not similarly impacted. We appreciate your feedback, and please do come stay with us in the future for more favorable stay.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Couldn't ask for a better staff interaction!
Summary: From the moment we walked in everyone was so sweet and welcoming. The check in desk was busy for just a couple of moments but made sure to let us know she would be with us as soon as possible. The room we stayed in was more than we expected and exceeded ALL expectations. I don't think we could have stayed anywhere near as nice for the same price, let alone get the same sweet staff as we did here.
Manager Response: Bree, thank you for your amazing review of Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. Our team will be pleased to know they had a role in making your stay with us a comfortable one. It was a pleasure serving you, and we look forward to welcoming you both back soon.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Extended Stay for 5 months. Staff was friendly, particularly Adriane (sp??) at the front desk; she was a total gem.  Hotel satisfied all necessary accommodations without interfering in our daily routine. When a request was made there was always a quick and satisfactory response. Breakfast was definitely minimal, and something more would have been nice, but at least they had the muffin and coffee which was enough to get out the door and start your day.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review, most especially the kind comments about Adriane. It's important to us that all our guests have a great experience, and we're delighted you enjoyed your stay with us. It was a pleasure serving you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Very friendly staff, accommodating, and the rooms are nice and spacious, clean, and a great value.  Adrienne is amazing, we will try to schedule our futures stays when she is working!  She deserves a raise ;-)
Manager Response: Thanks for reviewing your stay and for the feedback. We are pleased to know you received an excellent customer service from our staff and that you had an enjoyable stay. Your praises have been shared with the entire team, especially with Adrienne for a job well-done. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we would love to welcome you and your family back to Extended Stay America.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: I loved it. The room was really organized. There's a small kitchen with a fridge, stove and microwave. The kitchen is clean and customized with practical comforts package and optional amenities you can get. There's also a really big bed and a desk where you can use your laptop,  I'll stay here in the future again. I recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We take great pride in providing comfortable facilities and review like yours let us know we are on the right track. It was so good to have you here, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Great place to stay, within walking distance of Convention Center. Reasonable rates, clean rooms, very friendly staff. Many restaurants and shops nearby. For extended stays, the kitchen in the room is a great addition.
Manager Response: Ollie, thanks for choosing Extended Stay America and for the feedback. We are delighted to read you were not only pleased with our convenient location but also you liked the service offered by our staff along with the great value we offer. On behalf of everyone here, we would love to serve you again when in the area.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Everything was really good, clean and large room, availability of small kitchen is an advantage for travellers. All is good, except poor wall isolation. All activities from neighbouring and upper rooms sounds.
Manager Response: Oleg, thank you for choosing Extended Stay America. We are committed to ensuring a comfortable experience for each guest, and we thank you for letting us know we were successful. We appreciate your kind review and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: One the beds has blood stained sheets and the shower had a used washcloth from the previous guest... do they not clean the restroom? Also don’t walk in the back alone, lots of druggies sit outside  ear the smoking area
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We take these matters very seriously and appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will take the necessary actions to ensure these issues are properly addressed. Hotel Managment

Summary: Perfect for a 2-nite stay. Had all the comfy amenities, a nice kitchenette, laundry facilities and best of all, dog friendly :)   Facilities are clean and the staff politely accommodating and cordial :)
Manager Response: Thank you for including the Extended Stay America in your travel plans. We are glad you had a comfortable stay and that you loved your well-appointed room. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to hosting you again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Super nice staff and great room and pricing!
Summary: Adrienne at the front desk was super friendly! She greeted us with a smile every time we saw her. The manager Russ was very nice as well! The room rates were great and the room had a full kitchen. We walked to and from Disneyland and it took about 20 minutes from the hotel to the gates at Disneyland. I'm only staying here from now on whenever we visit Disneyland!
Manager Response: Emmanuel, thank you for choosing our hotel and for sharing your review. We are thrilled to read you both had a wonderful stay with us and also found us to be of a great value. We will share your compliments with the entire team, especially with Adrienne and Russ, for a job well done. Reviews such as yours mean a lot. Thanks again, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Extended Stay America  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Have stayed here for business as well as for personal travel & never had a bad room yet. I enjoy the fact you can cook in the room if you choose not to eat out every meal. It is really close to Downtown Disney so I enjoy the walk over to just get out and relax.
Manager Response: David, thank you for being a loyal guest and writing about your experience at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you liked your well-maintained room and were able to utilize the fully equipped kitchen to cook your own meals. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to hosting you again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel staff is very friendly. The hotel is clean (including the rooms). The beds were very comfortable as well.The things I liked most about this hotel was that it's 100% smoke free and is in walking distance to Disneyland. I did not experience any problems during my stay.
Manager Response: Nick, many thanks for the 5-star review of Extended Stay America. We are happy to know we exceeded your expectations for a wonderful stay and that you were awed by our spectacular hospitality. Reviews such as yours mean a lot! Thank you once more for your kind comments, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Eddie, the front desk guy, was terrific and went out of his way to make sure our stay was a pleasant as possible.  However, the "free breakfast" consisted SOLELY of instant oatmeal and granola bars.  Also stayed for 3 nights and the staff was never able to find a hair dryer for my daughter to use on her elbow-length hair.  Price was very economical, but you get what you pay for, including lack of amenities.
Manager Response: Ross, thank you for choosing our hotel and for your sharing your review. It was good to read you had an overall nice stay with us, and we will share your compliments with Eddie, for providing a good service. However we are sorry for the inconvenience you and your daughter had, and we will make sure to see what went wrong. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and hopefully, we will have the opportunity to make it up to you on a future visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel was just what I expected. It was a simple, decent hotel for just spending the night while you’re at Disneyland. We were not there to hang out at hotel , just to go sleep in a so so hotel room and not a motel 6.
Manager Response: Janice, we appreciate you for choosing Extended Stay America while here for your vacation. It was a pleasure knowing you liked our well-maintained property and that we meet your expectations for a relaxing stay. On behalf of the entire team, we thank you for the comments and invite you for another visit  on a future date.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Their was no one ever at the front desk, you had to ask for towels as needed, have to ask for toilet paper as needed, phone didn’t work in the room, and to top it all off their isn’t anyone to clean the rooms daily. Just overall our stay at this hotel was terrible.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay. Please accept our apology that we were not as responsive to your requests as we should have been. We will share your concerns with our team members, and we will take corrective measures to make sure that the issues you experienced do not happen again. We would also like to inform you that, to respect the privacy of our long term guests, our housekeeping service is conducted on a weekly basis, although we are always happy to provide this at your request for a minimal fee. We hope you will give us another chance to show you the stay you deserve.  Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: The new manager of this facility is a racists and need to be removed !!!! Slang words have been used by him to describe people of color and the place has been horrible customer service wise from him and him only !!! Adrienne is the kindest, sweetest, most professional manager, personal and business wise I have ever met at any hotel and she needs to be in the top spot there, not a racist !!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We take these matters very seriously and appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will take the necessary actions to ensure these issues are properly addressed. Hotel Management

Summary: This was a very good location from Disneyland. The hotel was very nice itself. I loved the kitchen area and the trees around the hotel make a pretty nice view, especially if you like parking your car in distance view
Manager Response: Alexis, thanks for the wonderful feedback and for staying with us. We are delighted to read you had an enjoyable stay here and that our convenient location close to Disneyland was up to your satisfaction. All of us at Extended Stay America would love to welcome you both back for another great visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Good value and close to disney
Summary: Great value for the room. Close to Disney and everything mostly clean. My only issue was that there was long hair in the tub that wasn't mine before showering. Apart from that it was a good place to sleep in and it was mostly clean.
Manager Response: Owen, thanks for taking the time to share your experience at Extended Stay America. It is a delight to know you were impressed with our ideal location and that we were able to meet your expectations at an affordable price. Your feedback regarding the oversight is shared with our housekeeping team. Thanks once more for your review, and we look forward to your next stay.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: We had a great stay. The staff is extremely helpful and welcoming. The hotel rooms are clean and tidy. The kitchen is an added bonus. This hotel is so close to Disneyland and they offer a shuttle to and from. It takes less than 10 minutes to arrive at the Disneyland gates.
Manager Response: Johnny, thank you for the wonderful review of Extended Stay America. We are thrilled to read you loved all the aspects of our hotel, especially our courteous service and your well-appointed room along with the kitchenette. Thanks again for being our guest, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Firstly, I'd like to thank Adrienne for her efforts, she did a great job and so did Eddy!   Me and my family went down to Anaheim to go to Disneyland and booked this hotel that is very close by. The hotel says they offer continental breakfast in the morning and that's a lie, the breakfast is literally cereal bars and coffee. Additionally when we arrived the first night there was no security latch on the inside of our door so I was worried the two four year olds that we were with could escape in the middle of the night. That was fixed the next day while we were out at the park which is good. Our TV remote never controlled the TV and that wasn't fixed until the last day which sucked but thankfully we were only there to sleep the park kept us entertained. Also the Linens were dirty
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Although you liked the service provided by Adrienne and Eddy, we are sorry for issues you had while being here and regret the inconvenience it caused. Your comments show that we have room for improvement, and we assure you we will be more diligent going forward. We invite you to come back and validate the changes we will be implementing and to experience the stay you expect and deserve.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Stains in the carpet and bedding, dog hair left on the chair (GROSS) squeeky heating/ac unit. The bathroom wasn't properly cleaned. When I tried to clean up after myself I found other ppls hair (GROSS)
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We sincerely apologize for the cleanliness issues you encountered which resulted in a disappointing stay. We have checklists in place to inspect every suite after it has been serviced. The cleanliness and room condition you describe is unacceptable and not at all representative of our quality standards. We are meeting with staff members to discuss this situation and reiterate the importance of impeccable customer service and attention to detail. We invite you to come back and validate the changes we will be implementing and to experience the stay you expect and deserve.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Hair in beds then changed and then hair in those beds shower faucet towels beds were squeaky and uncomfortable. Manager was very nice though. But many little pieces of hair everywhere. Im wondering if the dryer or washer has a clump or hair somewhere or something?
Manager Response: Alexandra, thank you for your review. We're truly sorry your room was not in the spotless condition it should have been when you arrived. We take the cleanliness of our rooms very seriously, so what you experienced is not typical for us. Our staff is 100% committed to providing fresh, clean accommodations for all of our guests, and we're sorry this was not the case for you. We are already taking steps to ensure oversights such as this do not happen again. We hope you will consider giving us a second chance the next time you are in our area.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel is great. Parking was easy. Check in was smooth. The front desk even offered to hold our bag before check in so we could go to the park as we were traveling on a motorcycle. Great place. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you were comfortable here and were impressed with the exceptional service provided by our staff. Thanks once more for your business, and we look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Great place. Friendly staff. Disneyland fireworks every night. Adrienne has gone above and beyond. Great restaurants within walking distance. One block from Disneyland main entrance. Wal-Mart is less than two miles away. Shopping is very close and very easily accessible.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay at Extended Stay America. It’s good to know you enjoyed the convenience of our location and that our associates left you with a good impression of our hotel. We will be sure to share your compliments with Adrienne for a job well done! Thanks again for your feedback, and we would love to welcome you back the next time you are in the area.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great Hotel/ Great Staff/ Great Location
Summary: Stayed there on Thanksgiving weekend, great Hotel. Very professional staff who were very helpful to me and my wife. Very close to the park and very close to the Toy Story parking lot. Also they have a shuttle bus  right outside the hotel that takes you right to Disneyland, and drops you right back off at hotel I believe it was 5 dollars but we'll worth it.There is a 7 eleven that is only a block away( walking distance ) you don't even have to cross a busy intersection to get there. I definitely recommend them if your in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks for posting a review so future travelers can read about your pleasant experience here at Extended Stay America. We are thrilled to read you and your wife loved our courteous associates who took great care of you and that you were impressed with our convenient location which was perfect for your needs. We appreciate you recommending us online and look forward to your next stay with us soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Martin was very friendly and was a great help. got an awesome price and great location. art transit takes you straight to disneyland. floor seemed a little dirty but not gross. bed was just average...
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing a nice review of Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you were pleased not only with our great value and the convenient location, but also with the courteous service provided by our associates. Your compliments will allow me to thank Martin for a job well done. We look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.    Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Worst customer service in our US trip
Summary: Location is great if you need to be near Anaheim transportation center, Honda Center or Angel stadium.   Rooms were satisfactory.   Breakfast was only coffee, cereal bars and sachet porridge. Although this is mentioned in introduction if you look thoroughly.   Unpleasant female staff behind the desk had zero intrest in customer service.
Manager Response: Matti, thank you for giving us your feedback regarding your stay. Please accept our apologies that our associates were not responsive to your needs. We strive to consistently deliver exceptional service, so we apologize for your disappointing experience with us. We have shared your feedback with the appropriate department heads, and steps have already been taken to keep these mistakes from being repeated. We truly hope you will give us another chance to prove that we are committed to providing outstanding service. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: My boys and I stayed for 5 nights during a recent trip to Disneyland and Southern California.  We enjoyed our stay.  I found nothing at all wrong with this hotel.  I called ahead of time to let them know we would be coming in later and asked about what items were available for the kitchen.  Adrienne was very helpful!  We arrived around 8:30-9ish after traveling for about 7 hours.  Russell was quick with our check-in and gave us suggestions for dinner.  Cheesecake Factory is never a fail! (The pumpkin cheesecake is much better than the original.  Just sayin'.)  After that, any time I had questions or needed anything, someone was available.  I had originally booked for four nights and decided to extend our stay another night and they were able to accommodate us without us having
Manager Response: Carolyn, thank you for choosing Extended Stay America during your trip. We are delighted to read you liked your room along with the kitchenette and our courteous service. We will be sure to share your compliments with the entire team, especially Adrienne. We appreciate you recommending us and look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.    Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Very close to the freeway, Anaheim Garden Walk, Disneyland, and Convention Center which is great. Amenities available at the front desk and the area is very safe which I liked. Not the best hotel, compared to others in the area, but worth it for a cheap and convenient weekend stay. I'd probably stay here again if I needed a quick get away.
Manager Response: Darrian, thank you for sharing your kind review. We are pleased to know our convenient location and affordable rates left you with a good impression of our hotels. Your feedback is of utmost value to us as it will help us to improve. We appreciate you choosing us and look forward to serving you better in the future.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Filthy!  There was trash in the elevators and hallways. I was shocked! The non smoking rooms smell of stale smoke. My bedding was dirty. I discovered that when I saw a stain under the sheet and found that the mattress pad was stained with what looked like old blood. VERY EXPENSIVE if you have a dog or furry friend with you. The staff is not friendly. I had issues with the wifi in my room and it had to be reset twice. Not my fault but the front desk clerk yelled at me. Outside my window is a tent city of homeless and then a clear view of the Honda Center. It is in a convenient location near a theater, and several really nice restaurants. There is a Starbucks walking distance on the other side of the parking area. There was a fire or something similar at the hotel that they did
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We take these matters very seriously and will take the necessary actions to ensure this is properly addressed. Hotel Management

Summary: My Room was dirty and had fleas. The sheets looked like that hadnt been changed. Staff was not very friendly. The "grab and go breakfast was horrible. The coffee was not made right or even hot. The "hot water" was room temperature.
Manager Response: It is disheartening to read you were unhappy with your stay. This is not the level of service we provide and it certainly doesn’t match our standards. Your comments are appreciated, and it has initiated additional training for our associates as we continuously improve. We deeply regret the inconvenience caused, and please consider giving us another opportunity so we can show you the example of our hospitality.    Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Do not stay here DIRTY DIRTY DIRTY
Summary: When we arrived the bed had hair all over it, there was fresh blood on the comforter and a fresh what looked like sperm on the sheets, ac didn't work in another room we had to,change out the sheets and never got a clean blanket so we were cold .  No staff apparently to change sheets or clean and maintain the rooms
Manager Response: It is very disappointing to know we failed to deliver you a stay that could meet your expectations. Our first preference is to ensure a spotless accommodation for every guest, but we are extremely sorry we fell short in doing so while you were here. Your concerns have been shared with our Housekeeping team in an effort to improve our service moving forward. Please consider giving us one more chance so we can redeem ourselves.   Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary: Hotel was very clean and everything functioned well. Only complaint is definitely the beds, deal breaker for me and my boyfriend. Beds were too hard for us, causing us to barely sleep and when in Disney, rest is very important.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and for your review. Although you enjoyed your overall time with us and liked our well-maintained property, we're sorry that you found our beds uncomfortable. Our front desk is available to resolve issues such as this, and we apologize we were not aware of the problem you had as we would have been happy to try and resolve the issue or move you to another room. Thanks once more for allowing us to be of service, and we hope you will return as we would love to provide you with a better experience and a good night's rest!  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: If I knew it was going to smell so bad I wouldn't have stayed here but can't get s refund so we stuck it out but we won't be staying here again. It also states walking distance to Disneyland but it clearly isn't that close we had to drive rather than walk like we wanted to.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We are sorry for not meeting your expectations with our location and for the odor issues you had while you were here. We are working with our housekeeping department to make sure all procedures are being followed so this does not happen again. We hope you will give us another chance the next time your travels bring you back this way.   Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great place for a family visiting Disneyland
Summary: only a 15 min walk to the parks entrance, our room had a kitchen, king bed and a pull out.  Lots of room for the 4 of us.  So great to be able to be close and make our own meals to save money and parking. Also very close to freeway to go exploring other places.  there was no daily maid service, and you had to go and ask for refills on things like toilet paper and to change towels, but we knew this going in, and we actually like it better not having people coming into our room daily.  And they were incredibly helpful and friendly at the front desk. The room was clean, comfortable, and we felt safe.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to read our location was ideal for your needs and that our facilities and service were to your satisfaction. We appreciate you sharing your nice comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Outstanding place, best place we've ever stayed in Anaheim area. Adrienne is great, makes front desk very user friendly for guests. Rooms are very nice, apartment like with fridge, stove, etc. Hotel is very clean. Mattress is high end a puppy, excellent to sleep on.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of Extended Stay America. We are thrilled to read you loved your well-appointed room and the courteous service provided by Adrienne. We will be sure to share your compliments. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we hope to see you and your family again soon.  Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great option if you are visiting Disney
Summary: Good facilities, friendly staff and walking distance to the park. This hotel was a pleasant surprise and good value proposition. Has a pool and in house laundry and close proximity to some good restaurants.
Manager Response: Gustaaf, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest at Extended Stay America. We are delighted to know you were overwhelmed not only with our outstanding hospitality and convenient location but also with the value we offer. Thanks for all of your great feedback, and we look forward to hosting you and your family again soon.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a couple of nights and had a welcoming and comfortable visit. The hotel has free parking that is easy to access.  There are many businesses within walking distance (Walgreens, CVS, and plenty of restaurants). Disneyland is also within walking distance (a comfortable 15-20 minute walk). The staff was also extremely welcoming and made us feel at home. Shout out to Jolene at the front desk. We even had a great conversation with another employee in the elevator about our stay (can't remember her name). Overall, this place provides a good quality stay!
Manager Response: Michael, thank you for posting such kind comments about our hotel, especially about our staff. We make every effort to provide service that is above and beyond your expectations, so we are pleased to see that you loved your stay. I will share your wonderful compliments with my entire team, especially Jolene. Thanks for choosing Extended Stay America and we hope to welcome you again soon!  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location near Anaheim Convention Centre and Disneyland
Summary: I did an early check-in and the room was not very clean (found men's underwear in the cubby under the sink) and no phone or towels to call front desk. The Manager, Adrienne, when informed of the situation was very apologetic and had the staff remedy the situation as I left the room. 3 minute walk to Garden Walk with lots of restaurant and nightlife choices and 15 min walk to convention centre. Seemingly safe area. Staff were helpful and friendly. Compared to other hotels in the area, it was the best bang for $. I would recommend.
Manager Response: Cari, thank you for being our guest and taking the time to review your experience at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are thrilled to read you loved our convenient location which was perfect for your needs and our friendly associates who took great care of you. We appreciate you recommending us online and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for almost 4 months for work and I never had any problems! Everyone was so nice and will to help in any way they could! Definitely made me feel at home!! It's only a 20 minute walk to downtown Disney and to the Disney parks! The ART bus is also available for getting around the resort areas ( and the extended stay sells tickets at the desk). Very accommodating for my pup too!
Manager Response: Kim, thank you for your wonderful feedback about Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are delighted to know you liked our convenient location and that the attentive service provided by our associates added to your joy. We hope to welcome you again whenever your travels bring you back here.    Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: I was disappointing with our stay. Bed sheets were not changed before our stay. Location is great ,but the front desk was slow or non responsive to request. It was great to have a refrigerator but the stove was difficult to cook with.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. Although we are happy you liked our location, we are sorry for the service issues you had and the inconvenience it caused. We take your comments seriously and will use them to ensure we consistently deliver a great stay for future guests. We hope you give us another chance to serve you better in the future.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Clean,safe. Walk to eating places and garden walk for shopping. No crossing busy intersections. Staff values your choice and shows it.pool for kids to wk off excess energy. Good price, nice big laundry room
Manager Response: Thank you for including Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center in your travel plans. It’s so nice to read our location was convenient for your needs and that our associates left you with a good impression. Your feedback is much appreciated, and we look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Our family stayed for a week at this hotel. Weare not satisfied at all. Befor3e this feedback we tried to call and email to General manager Russell L Herbel, but got no response.  Please see the main complaints below: 1. 2 people have to sleep on 38'' Twin size mattress.  2. Terrible mattress - springs punched my back all the time. 3. Couldn't leave or change our room: largest room in this hotel and everything is booked elsewhere. 4. Bad service: went down to lobby to get king mattress protector,  2 times got a queen and last time got nothing (they don't have a replacement). 5. A toaster didn't work had to go for a replacement.  6. A toilet wasn't attached to a ground and shaking. 7. 3 lights not working in the room. 8. Wi-fi did work for at least a day. Called support:, they
Manager Response: It is very disappointing to read your comments concerning your stay at our hotel. Please accept our apologies, as we never mean to disappoint our guests in any way, and we definitely failed in this attempt. We can assure you that what you experienced is not acceptable by our standards, and we will be reviewing and altering our guidelines to provide a more wonderful experience for every guest entering our doors. Thank you for your candid feedback as this helps us to improve the experience for future guests. Please consider giving us the opportunity to make it up to you on a future visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: This location is perfectly located for all our needs.
Summary: The management and staff are supportive of all our needs, as we search for a property in the general area.  The location is perfect for our transition from Las Vegas back to Orange County, and is walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your stay with us at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. It’s a pleasure knowing you loved our convenient location which made your stay enjoyable. We hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: Filthy, dusty and would not choose this hotel again!
Summary: When we arrived we had a quick check in and given our room. Upon entering our room I noticed the furniture and carpet were filthy (dusty) I ran my fingers through the dresser and it was filthy dirty.  I opened the fridge and there was a hair inside of it.  The furniture and kitchenette looked dated and they offered us no plates. I had to go to front office and request bowls (which were like for 2 yr olds) size.  The grab n go breakfast was pitiful --the coffee was very watered down. The walls were paper thin and you can hear the neighbor guests at one point at night the guests upstairs had children and they were running around at 1am in the morning! Overall I would not choose this hotel again.  The only positive I would say it is the proximity to Disneyland it is about a 10
Manager Response: Nananina, we truly care about ensuring the comfort of all our guests, so I apologize that we fell short. We are addressing our Head of Housekeeping regarding the cleanliness issue. We have checks and balances in place to double inspect every room before guest checks in, or returns back to their room. We are redoubling our efforts to make sure that we adhere to these set procedures. Our front desk is also staffed to assist your needs, so we would have been happy to address the noise issue if you had alerted us. We hope you and your family will give us another opportunity to deliver the service and hospitality you deserve should your travels bring you back.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Terrific location, easy access and parking, superb family restaurants in walking distance, close to Disneyland and freeways.  Friendly staff responsive and helpful.  For a long-term stay, this was a very convenient and comfortable choice for easy SoCal activity.
Manager Response: Thank you for including Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center in your travel plans. We are very pleased to read our location was ideal for your needs and that you enjoyed the service delivered by our helpful associates. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have the honor of hosting you again soon.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Great location when visiting Disneyland. Front desk guy at time of check in was a champion making us feel welcome and explaining everything to us very knowledgeable guy. Room is reasonable and fairly clean except for the stained pillow case. Room is basically arranged and a decent size for what we paid. The swimming pool is also reasonable.
Manager Response: Craig, thank for sharing an outstanding review of Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are thrilled to read our team made you feel welcomed & accommodating and that you found our location convenient. We also appreciate you mentioning that you found us to be at a good value. Thanks again, and we look forward to having back soon with us.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: My sheets were VERY dirty at check in!
Summary: I didn't realize my sheets were dirty until around 11pm.  There was no doubt in my mind they had not been changed as there were dozens of long black hairs on top of the sheets.  I let the front desk know and they said they were full and couldn't move me and they didn't have any other staff so I could get clean sheets and change them myself!  It seems like short staffing is the key to the issues here.  It was disgusting to change these sheets and the staff didn't really care.  Eventually, the next day I talked with a manager who made sure I got a full refund and I checked out.  Never again will I stay here.
Manager Response: Susanne, we are very sorry your stay did not live up to your expectations. We never want any of our guests to leave unhappy. It was disheartening to read about the cleanliness issues you encountered with your guest room and our front desk staff did not resolve the situation. Your comments have prompted our management team to redouble training efforts so we can be sure to meet the high standards you should always expect from us every single stay. We hope you will consider giving us another chance so we can prove this is not typical of our service.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Hotel did not meet our expectations.  There was a group of us that stayed and we all had issues of some sort with our rooms.  Beds are extremely hard, rooms were not clean, never had clean towels available and the hotel itself was filthy.  Every day we saw sketchy people around the facility doing drugs and there were kids around; as we were very close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We take these matters very seriously and appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better stay in the future.  General Manager

Summary: This place was filty... was unable to check in at appropriate time. Front desk was EXTREMELY RUDE. My room was filty. I had to go out and buy cleaning products to clean the room myself. Really, this is not what I paid for
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback of your stay. I am very disappointed to see that your feedback referenced the description of our hotel as "filthy". Our promise to our guest includes a commitment to providing a clean, fresh environment and I am very sorry that did not happen when you were here. I am concerned about your experience and have immediately brought this to the attention of my housekeeping team for review and action. Please know this is not usual for us, and we hope you give us another chance in the future.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Upon check in, I found the room was not properly serviced. There were used, dirty towels left in the bathroom. If it wasn’t for the excellent and swift response by Cheryl at the front desk to remedy the situation, I probably would be writing a bad review right now. The customer service that she provided, was nothing less than exceptional. She was kind, courteous, and friendly upon check in, and continued that attitude even after I let her know of my room condition.   The one thing I feel that can be improved on is the cleanliness of the property. I understand that they are in the middle of a renovation, but the construction crews could take a little more care to clean up the dust and debris after the day is done. The outside grounds could be cleaned and maintained better. There
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have you as our guest at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are thrilled to read about the great service you received from Cheryl and how her actions exceeded your expectations. She will be pleased to hear your compliments. However, we are sorry for the cleanliness issues you encountered and for the inconvenience it caused. We assure you we will be more diligent going forward. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to our updated hotel.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: This place is conveniently located near the rental car companies and walking distance to food joints and restaurants. The staff is friendly with relatively good service. Don't expect too much for the breakfast though as it's pick and go kind. Overall above average.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are pleased you had an overall nice stay and loved our location which made your visit enjoyable. We will make a note of your feedback as we plan any changes to our complimentary grab-and-go breakfast. We hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you and your friends back soon at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: We really only needed a room for the night so expectations weren't high. When we arrived we had to wait 20 minutes before even seeing anyone at the front desk. Eri was very nice but he seemed to be working alone and was very busy and rushed. Once we reached our floor the smell was unpleasant, a very strong food odor which isn't surprising considering the kitchens in the rooms. The room did not smell very clean. Finally, the bed was very very uncomfortable, and we ended up getting only about 4 hours of sleep and back pain. We only needed the room to rest but we couldn't even do that.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies, as we never mean to disappoint our guests in any way, and we definitely failed in this attempt. We will be reviewing and altering our guidelines to provide a more wonderful experience for every guest entering our doors. We hope you will consider giving us another chance to show you the outstanding service that we typically provide.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Hotel staff are very responsive to our requests and needs, and the location is great.  The shops and restaurants are within walking distance, as is Disneyland and we can see fireworks from our window.  Parking on the property is adequate, and there are shuttles and public bus services readily available
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Extended Stay America. We are thrilled to know our location was convenient for your needs and that you were impressed with the service provided by our staff. We will be sure to share your compliments with my entire team for a job well done! It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary: Because the front desk staff were not very helpful and there was no one there at night when we needed help; the water was turned off on day 3 of our stay to fix the boiler; the hotplate didn't work; there was no kettle to boil water for tea; there were no provisions for sugar, tea,coffee, etc in the room; the so-called 'breakfast' that was provided was a muffin and some granola bars which you had to queue up for in the lobby and you were lucky if you got any; and our bag was stolen by the customer who stayed in the room opposite us.  He had a huge, fierce boxer dog in the room and he kept the door ajar the night before we moved out and we heard the dog growl and saw our bag in the doorway.  We were too scared to do anything about it and the front desk said they couldn't help! I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We take these matters very seriously and appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better stay in the future. General Manager

Summary: This is the fifth time I stayed at this hotel. It is a long walk to Disneyland. But very easy to do. Free parking included and the rooms have full-size refrigerators and all you need more simple meals. Since I am on their email list I got a great discount and compared to similar hotels was a fantastic value. I would definitely recommend and stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty towards Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. Nothing pleases us more than to know that we have provided everything necessary for you to have an enjoyable stay once again. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Dirty! When we arrived the place was dirty. The microwave had chocolate and the desk pieces of brownie or somethlike that. There were hairs on the bathroom and linen. The room is good size it has a good kitchen and bathroom and the air conditioning was very good but the fact that nobody care when we told them it was dirty.... no way i would recommend it..
Manager Response: We're truly sorry your room was not in the spotless condition it should have been when you arrived. We take the cleanliness of our rooms very seriously, so what you experienced is not typical for us. We are already taking steps to ensure oversights such as this do not happen again. We hope you will consider giving us a second chance the next time you are in our area.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: I would not recommend anyone to stay there it's dirty smelly . No maid service they want do construction while we staying hallway was chunks of dust  . Only good thing about it is location wasn't to bad across street from shopping centers walking distance from Disney other then that I would not recommend anyone to stat
Manager Response: Dejan, we sincerely apologize for the cleanliness issues you experienced while here. Since we are an extended stay property, we provide housekeeping service on a weekly basis, but, these services are always available upon request for a nominal fee. That being said, we are sorry for the inconvenience you encountered with regard to our ongoing update as well. Please consider giving us another opportunity to redeem ourselves in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back to our revamped hotel.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Hotel was really clean , great staff with great customer service have stayed here twice and both times they have been great i would defenetly will countinue to stay here in the future. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for returning to Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center and for sharing your wonderful feedback. It is so good to know we meet all of your expectations again and that you were especially happy with your spotless room and our top-notch service. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to many more visits from you and your family.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Phone didn't work. No housekeeping which means ANYTHING you need, YOU have to go get. Had to pull someone else's hair off the towels before we could use them. The bathroom was disgusting. The floors were dirty.
Manager Response: Please accept my apologies for your disappointment with our housekeeping policy and for the issues you experienced while here. Our housekeeping is done on a weekly basis to respect the privacy of our guests and offer minimal intrusion, we are always happy to provide whatever you need during your stay. Nonetheless, we will ensure our facilities are kept clean and are in a good working order. We hope to have the opportunity to make it up to you on a future visit.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: Thank you to the whole team at ESA Convention center
Summary: We spent 2 months at this location and I must say that each member of staff were so hospitable and were very helpful starteing from housekeeping, Caroline and Tokashe who were family, we even received a small Minnie Mouse bag for our baby which was very touching from V*** who was covering on the weekend.. We shall come back for sure and recommend this property for anyone looking for a great location to stay in Orange and want to feel the family spirit! George & Evgeniya
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have you as our guest at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are delighted to read you had a wonderful time and like the excellent service provided by our staff. I will share your compliments with the entire team, especially Caroline and Tokashe. Thanks for your kind words and recommendation. We look forward to hosting you and your family again soon.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: Caroline Thank You ANAHEIM cONVENTION cENTER LOCATION
Summary: Pleasant stay very well taking care of thank God for Caroline at the front desk she is awesome. She recognized and addressed me when I walked in the door and I was touched because she said my name because she remembered me staying there before a year ago. I was surprised I liked that.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review filled with so many kind comments! We are thrilled to read you had a great stay with us at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We appreciate you mentioning our staff, especially Caroline. She is a true asset to our team, and we will be sure to share your compliments. Again, thanks for your feedback, and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Carolyn (manager) decided she wasn't going to honor our 52 nights reservation & corporate policies didn't apply to her location!  Twice got checked in to a filthy room that wasn't cleaned at all.  Wasn't apologitic.  Checked out 4 days later, she decided she could charge whatever she wanted regardless of contractual reservation rate!  Such attitudes are why good companies fail! Very disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We take these matters very seriously and appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better stay in the future. General Manager

Summary: Very nice and clean rooms did not smell whatsoever. The breakfast was not so great but the kitchen made up for it and the rooms were very spacey. the beds looked clean and the accommodations with small things were great.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are thrilled to know you had a wonderful experience with us and that you found your suite to be spacious, clean, and comfortable with lots of room to relax. We appreciate your great feedback and hope to have you as our guest again.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: please give Eri a bonus of some kind.
Summary: i was hesitant when booking this hotel, especially since the girl on the phone that helped wasn't very friendly. but once i got to the hotel Eri was there to make my experience 10 times better than what i expected! I work in the hotel/hospitality industry so i have very high standards with how the workers should be acting during work and treating guests. I would definitely come again and i hope that Eri is there to make that stay wonderful as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your experience at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. It is wonderful to read about the outstanding service you received from Eri who left a wonderful impression on you. Your compliments will surely be shared, along with my personal thanks. We all look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Finding this property was a nice surprise because the rate was reasonable and the location fabulous. It takes 12 minutes to walk to the Disney gates and the Cheesecake Factory, PF Chang's and McCormick and Schmick's are directly across the street in a large walking mall. The mall also has a 24 Hour fitness that you can purchase a temporary membership. The rooms here are clean and updated, they are quiet and all of the outdoor entries are in working order, I feel very safe here. The staff is outstanding led by Cheryl and Carolyn.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure having you as our guest at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are delighted to know you loved all the aspects of your business visit, especially our location and your spotless room. I will surely share your compliments with Cheryl and Carolyn for a job well-done. We hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and much cheaper than onsite hotels
Summary: Unless you're looking for a real continental breakfast or a resort style hotel, this is a good bargain. The rooms have a kitchenette and are clean. Ours had two queens and plenty of space.The area has many other hotels and businesses surrounding it, but is quiet. We really only needed it for a place to crash after a full day at Disneyland, and this is fine for that.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are glad to know you not only enjoyed our convenient location and your well-appointed room but also found us to be a good value. We appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely,  General Manager

Summary Heading: Not All 2.5 Star Hotels Are Created Equal...
Summary: Where can I start? We needed a place to stay as our home was flooded. We had stayed at a Best Western Plus which is also a 2.5 star hotel the night before and were pleasantly surprised at the quality! So we came here, thinking this would be similar. Not even close. Rooms smell of mildew. Even though they're not visibly dirty, they just "feel" dirty. A/C is just a rusty old window hanging unit. Very dated and tired. Needs a major facelift. I would think this is a 1.5 star, MAYBE 2 at best but no way is it a 2.5. We won't be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. On behalf of our entire team, please accept our apologies for providing you with anything less than a satisfactory experience. Please be assured that we are taking immediate steps to avoid such problems in the future. It is our goal to provide an excellent experience to each guest, so we hope you and your family will give us a chance to redeem ourselves the next time you visit our area.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Cheryl was great. She is very nice and polite and always has a warm smile.  She made sure we had everything we needed and answered all all questions. A very hard worker and a definite asset not only to this hotel but Extended America as a whole.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. I am thrilled to read your feedback about the great service you received from our staff and how they exceeded your expectations. I will share your compliments with Cheryl. We appreciate your kind review and hope to have you back with us again in future.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: One Night stay before our WorldMark was available
Summary: The staff was friendly enough. The room was clean. Nothing fancy or spectacular. The bed was comfy. Worth what you paid for. Uber rides to an Angels game ran less than $6 each way!!The only reason we gave it a 3/5 is the smell. The cigarette smell is overwhelming and nauseating. We had a non-smoking room and, although fresher than the hallways and elevator, still smelled like an ashtray.
Manager Response: Jenn, thank you for letting us know about your visit to our hotel. Although you liked our courteous associates and the affordable rates, we are sorry for the inconvenience you experienced due to the smoke smell during your stay. We have strict policies where we prohibit smoking in some areas, and I appreciate you bringing this to my attention so I can address it appropriately. We hope you will consider us again whenever you are in our area.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: This hotel was great ! A nice little room with a kitchen . The front desk associate Carolyn was awesome and got us checked in quickly and made changes to the account because some how my reservations were cancelled but they immediately fix it. I also spoke to Kimmy before arriving she was the one that notify me about my hotel cancellation and she was also very kind and efficient in making sure I knew what I needed to do when I got to the hotel. Thank you for making my family trip a hassle free day.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your review of the Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. Our goal is to make your stay as comfortable as possible and to assist you with whatever you need, so it's nice to know our team accomplished it. I will share your compliments with Carolyn and Kimmy. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to our hotel soon.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: The hotel is very comfy with very comfy beads and clean rooms! The staff is very kind and helpful. I would stay hereagain for shure if i ever swing on by again. 😊   The staff is very helpful and willing to answe any of the questions you might have about the area! I was also impressed that the place you do youre laundry in on the first floor was so convient. The muffins and coffie in the mornings was a nice touch!
Manager Response: Wow – thank you for your wonderful feedback of Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are glad to know you loved your room and our complimentary grab-and-go breakfast. We also appreciate your kind remarks about our staff. I will share your kind comments with them. We love you as our guest and look forward to seeing you and your friends again soon.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: The negative reviews were not my experience
Summary: I purchased this after finding a very cheap package deal. I then read over some reviews and thought - oh dear.  In truth, I shouldn't have been worried. The room I was in was clean. The people very friendly and helpful.It was fantastically located - across the street from GardenWalk with it's entertainment and food - and walking distance to Disneyland. Parking was plentiful and I had a great stay.  Downsides; my room was cleaned just the once in my 8 days of staying there and the breakfast isn't all that. More than happy to overlook those for what was otherwise a very comfortable, pleasant stay. Thanks very much.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your great experience you had at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are happy to read you liked your comfortable room and our location which was perfect for your travel plans. Please know, our housekeeping service is provided once a week for guests staying eight or more nights. For those who are staying for shorter periods of time, services are available for a minimal fee. Your feedback is appreciated, and we will be sure our front desk communicates this more clearly going forward. Thank you for being our guest, and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  General Manager

Summary: When I first check in to the room, the bathroom was not clean. There was disgusting stain on the tub. Unfortunately I wasn't aware until trying to take a shower around 9pm. I went to the front desk, the guy told me all the housekeepers were gone and there was nothing he could do. I asked to change room. He told me the hotel was fully booked which was a lie cuz the parking lot was not even half full and I was able to see availability on their website.... Anyway, he said he was going to sent housekeeper to clean my room the following morning which was another lie. I left room really early in the morning and when I came back around 7pm, the bathroom was still dirty!!! I had to complain to the front desk again. This time the new guy gave me another room. The second room was a bit
Manager Response: We appreciate when our guests provide feedback, as it is a tool for us to continuously improve.  Our guests should expect to arrive to a clean, well maintained suite, and we apologize for the lack of detail from our staff and our inspection team.  We can and will do better.  You are valued as a loyal guest, and we hope this one instance will not deter you from staying with us again.  Thank you, General Manager

Summary: Very impressed with staff (very friendly) check in was fast, room was spacious and clean. Parking was safe & secure. Location was conveniently located to restaurants, stores, Disney Land. Weather was beautiful for this time of year (January). Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review so future travelers can read about your pleasant experience here at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are thrilled to read that you loved our friendly associates, convenient location close to the area restaurants and shopping choices, as well as your well-appointed room. It was great to have you here, and we look forward to your next stay with us soon.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: Unfortunately, would not recommend staying here.  😟😟
Summary: We stayed here for 3 days for a Disneyland vacation with son and his family of 5.  Booked well in advance and asked for rooms next to each other.  Did not get.  Grab and go breakfast was packaged muffins and granola bars.  Room kitchen was out of date with refrigerator that did not even make ice cubes.  Hairdryer blew out while using.  Dishes and pots and pans were old and hotel actually ran out of bowls.   Bed comforter was stained.  Bathroom shower nozzle was separated from wall showing inside of wall.  Water handle was backwards supplying hot for cold water and visa versa.  While staff was cordial, there were times when no one was at front desk.  There was no guest restroom in lobby requiring us to use staff bathroom while we waited for our room.  Our room was $109 for king
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit and for your feedback. We are sorry you had a substandard experience. Our team strives to make sure each guest has a pleasant stay, so I apologize we did not deliver. Thank you for pointing this out, as it will help us improve. We hope you will consider returning for another stay the next time you are in our area.  We value you as our guest and would love the opportunity to provide you with the hospitality you anticipated during this trip. Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: A Great Location for a Good Price
Summary: Stayed at the Extended Stay America during a recent jaunt to disneyland.  Found the location to be ideal - 10 min walk into the park, close to my fav Cheesecake Factory and the Garden Grove Mall!  One complaint was the room not being super clean (we found garbage under the bed).  When in the pool we could see cats in one of the upper floor suites - the employee at the front desk told us that there were people that lived in the hotel and had pets.  I was surprised...  I think it could have been cleaner, the breakfast was adequate, but the location was ideal.  I think if they put some more effort into cleanliness and customer service (guy on the night shift didnt even want to deliver my dishes and glassware to the room!!!) they could be a solid 4.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure having you as our guest. We are thrilled to note that you liked our location and the good value we offer in the area. That being said, we regret the inconvenience you encountered with the cleanliness of your room as well as our service. We appreciate your comments which will help us improve our overall guest experience. We hope to see you again when in our area so that we can make it up to you.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: did not meet expectations for the type of hotel it is, not staying there again
Summary: i stayed at this hotel with my friend for new years eve weekend and we were there for 3 nights. we came with high expectations cause we heard extended stay america had a kitchen and we were excited to maybe cook. upon coming to the hotel the front desk wasn't very friendly and said housekeeping is extra charge and asked if i wanted houseekeeping so i said no. upon getting to the room, there was a stove and microwave, full fridge but no utensils, pots, pans, plates, toaster and it said we could ask for it but after hearing housekeeping was extra fee, i didn't even want to ask for anything extra. the feet towel was already dirty too and on new years day, my friend was in the room in the afternoon and she said she almost reported a noise complaint cause next door a couple were
Manager Response: Sarah, It is disappointing that our hotel did not meet your expectations in several ways, and we apologize your overall stay was not satisfying.  We will work to improve the deficiencies you identified.  Our team leaders have been notified of your comments, and have been directed to make the necessary corrections so you and our future guests will have a positive stay experience when visiting our hotel.  Thank you for providing your feedback. General Manager

Summary: We stayed in Extended stay America in Anaheim, CA. This is the worst hotel I have ever been to. We stayed there during the Christmas time and upon our arrival, there were no coffee maker, no kitchen utensils in the room, no soaps or shampoos in the bathroom , beds with dirty sheets and blankets with stains in it. After asking them 4 times they finally gave some dirty utensils before checking out with food sticking to it. Their website says they had full breakfast but it was actually a small table in the front lobby with cereal bar and boxed muffins. We asked for an extra pillow and a sheet but they said they did not have any extra. The room was on 1st floor close to the lobby and in front of an elevator. We could not sleep the whole night because of we can hear people talking in
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review, we apologize your stay was less than perfect. Your experience is not representative of our usual performance, and we regret falling short of your expectations.  We hope you will consider staying with us again as we would love to provide you with an excellent experience.      Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: it's the most beautifuul and comfortable hotel in this street and the employees is very hosts and very kindlly and Cheryl is the best one .she helped me many times and adviced me many things. iam really thanx her
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at Extended Stay America Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are thrilled to read you had an amazing stay and loved our well-kept property. Thanks for mentioning our staff, especially, Cheryl. She is a true asset to our team, and we will be sure to share your gracious compliments with her for the excellent service she provides. It was a plesaure serving you, and we hope to see you again soon!     Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: Room is not clean. Agoda final price is not final
Summary: Like many people said in comments, room is not clean. They didnt even change bed sheet. So many hairs on bed. I have to put the towel on the bed and pillow so i can sleep.   I booked it on adoga and pay cash. It showed I pay 517 at the counter but end up i pay 606 because the manager said it doesn't not include tax.  I asked if there is shuttle to Disneyland. The answer is positive, but when i get there the manager say no.   Wifi is very slow. Checkin is extremely slow.  Besides are good. You pay what you get. Free coffee is good. Room is big. Kitchen is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback about your stay with us. Although we are glad you liked your spacious room, we are sorry for the cleanliness issue you had with it. While our housekeeping service is designed for long-term guests, offering minimal intrusion to their home-like stay, we are happy to offer this service to you at a minimal fee. We also regret for any other inconvenience caused while you were here. Thank you again, we hope to welcome you back soon.     Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: great team - cheryl was very helpful
Summary: very nice team, enjoyed the stay and team was helpful. they give ameneties and look after the guests :).  I stayed for 2 months and it was a nice stay and the location is amazing close to disneyland and nice restaurants
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to review your experience at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are so pleased to read you loved our convenient location which was perfect for your needs and that you were impressed with our helpful associates. We will surely share your review with our team, especially with Cheryl, for a job well done. It was great to have you here, and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: One of the worst places I have stayed in a very long time.  First impressions are everything! Outside landscaping in need of maintenance. The lobby was a disgusting mess--had palm tree seeds all over the carpet. We (3 couples) originally arrived before checkin time & our rooms were not ready which was fine! We went back 2 hrs later, the receptionist gave us the keys to the rooms & 2 rooms were a mess--not made up, dirty.  Went back to let receptionist know & sat around waiting, waiting. There is no restroom in lobby area! She finally gave us a key to a suite to wait in! By the time our rooms were ready it was after 8:00PM & we were greeted with a disgusting fish smell which permeated the halls of the hotel, as when people cook in the rooms the ventilation is bad. Our friends
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and providing your feedback. Please accept our apologies for the "unkempt" condition of the suites and the lobby are you reported in your review. Your comments will be shared with our team so we can address these issues immediately. We take great pride in the service, cleanliness and maintenance of our hotel, and we hope this isolated incident will not keep you from returning to enjoy a great experience next time. Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: We had a lovely stay for more than 3 weeks at this nice hotel. The location of the hotel is perfect with less than 5 minutes walk to Disneyland! The staff was were nice and friendly and I have to express my appreciation to Carolyn and Cheryl for being very helpful, nice and considerate people. The breakfast and coffee were also very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your extended stay at our hotel, Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are so glad our location was perfect for your visit and that you were very impressed with the service our staff delivered. We work hard to provide high levels of service, so we will share your compliments with Carolyn and Cheryl to let them know their efforts are appreciated. Thank you for being our guest, we look forward to seeing you in the future!    Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: Worst hotel i stayed in usa
Summary: I am an international traveller and i stayed in this hotel for 14 days. The total charge is $865 but these cheaters charged me a extra $672 without my knowledge in my credit card. They charged me after my check out date and whenever i call them, they say they are just investigating on this. Bloody buggar i dont know what these guys are investigating in my money. highly not recommended for internationals travellers. Stay away from these money pigs
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our hotel. I apologize there was a potential overcharge for your stay. I assure you that this was not deliberate, and I apologize for the inconvenience this caused you. I am investigating our records and will contact you as soon as possible to make this right. General Manager

Summary: We stayed there with our 2.5 years old. It is a decent place to stay if you have budget restrictions. It is at walkable distance tom disneyland. There are lots of great places to eat around. The rooms have fully equipped kitchenette which was must to have for us. Bathroom was not good. Reception staff was nice, helpful and courteous. All in all it was a good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay at Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. We are glad you were pleased with our location close to Disneyland and the comfort of having a kitchen in our suites as this is an important feature to many travelers staying for multiple nights. We appreciate your feedback and hope that your overall comfortable stay will bring you back to our hotel again in the future.   Sincerely, General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect value place for families visiting Disneyland
Summary: While this is not the fancy type hotels it is very nice for a family.  Each suite has a complete full size refrigerator, stove, microwave and dishwasher with dishes and coffee maker available.  If you drive in just bring enough groceries and have breakfast, snacks and coffee comfortable while getting the kids dressed and ready for a fun day in the park.  The shuttle bus stops right out front and discount multi day tickets are available.  Over 65 age is only one dollar each way with I.D. if not obvious that age.  Free wifi, you control the temperature controls and roomy bathroom more than adequate for the entire family.  Finally if you join their email club, they often send coupons with 20 25% off with a little planning you can get a night very reasonable that will accommodate
Manager Response: We appreciate your fantastic review of Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. Thank you for mentioning us as a great value for money. We are thrilled to know how much you appreciated our well-appointed suite complete with a kitchen as well as our excellent location. Impressing our guests is our top priority, so I am happy that you left with such good memories of our hotel. Thanks again for the great review. Please come and see us again!    Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: needed help changing rooms because we messed up what rooms we had reserved. they changed it and made it very easy. great service! they were very nice about it and this isnt the first time we have stayed there. always a good and easy time at this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center. There is no better compliment than a guest who keeps coming back time after time! I'm so glad you continue to enjoy our exceptional service, especially that you received from our Front Desk Team. I will definitely share your compliments with them. It is always a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we look forward to your next stay! Thanks again.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: It was perfect for going to Disneyland with my spouse muffins and coffee in the morning and oatmeal can't go wrong with the hotel highly recommend it! Service at front desk was excellent and 5$ shuttle for the whole day
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review of Extended Stay America - Orange County - Anaheim Convention Center and for being our valued guest. It is great to read that you were impressed with our convenient location, the breakfast we serve and our front desk service. We appreciate you recommending us online and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, General Manager
